Hotel_Description_Long:
Offering city views, Magatzem 128 is an accommodation situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Magic Fountain of Montjuic and 1.8 km from Passeig de Gracia. It is set 1.4 km from Sants Railway Station and offers a lift. The guest house has family rooms as well as facilities for disabled guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the guest house also have free WiFi. At the guest house, units are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Casa Batllo and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Magatzem 128.

The H La Paloma is located in the Raval neighborhood, just 200 meters from the Sant Antoni market.
 The rooms at H La Paloma feature modern and elegant decoration.
They feature a king-size bed, free Wi-Fi, Smart TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. It also has private parking and 24-hour room service.
The H La Paloma has the ideal location to visit the major centers of interest on foot, being 600 meters from the MACBA Museum of Modern Art and just a 5-minute walk from Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas.
The Sant Antoni and Universidad metro stations are just a few meters away.

This guest house is 100 metres from Liceu Metro Station and Barcelona’s famous Ramblas. Hostal Europa offers basic rooms in a central location, and has free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Most rooms at the Europa have shared bathroom facilities. Rooms with a private ensuite bathroom are available.

Barcelona’s main tourist attractions are within a short walk. The Boqueria Market is 200 metres from the Europa, and Barcelona Cathedral and Plaza Catalunya are a 5-minute walk away.

The Hostal Europa has a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car or bicycle at the tour desk.

A continental breakfast is served at a neighbouring restaurant.

Situated next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Station, this boutique hotel offers a stylish lounge. Rooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Sixtytwo Hotel is set in a typical 19th-century building. Each elegant room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. Some overlook Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, while others overlook the hotel´s charming Japanese-style garden.

A continental breakfast is served daily at a cafe nearby. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help arrange car hire.

This boutique hotel offers 45 spacious and stylish rooms. It is situated in Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia, next to Diagonal Avenue, the city’s best shopping area, where you can also find a wide variety of restaurants and tapas bars.

Hotel Sixtytwo is across the road from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, and La Pedrera is just 3 minutes' walk away. It is just a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Nearby Passeig de Gràcia Station offers Metro services and direct airport trains.

Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants.

Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

Hotel Cantón is situated in central Barcelona, less than 300 metres from Las Ramblas and the city’s Old Port. It offers 24-hour reception and rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access throughout.

The Cantón has brightly decorated rooms with private bathrooms. Each has a fridge, air conditioning and heating.

The Cantón serves a daily breakfast and has a vending machine selling hot drinks. Guests can make use of the hotel’s TV room, where there is also computer.

The Cantón has easy access to many of Barcelona’s tourist attractions and has a tour desk. Plaza Reial is less than 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel and there are several bars and restaurants within walking distance.

Drassanes Metro Station is under 500 metres from the Cantón and Sants Train Station is 5 stops away.

Barcelona House Hotel is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, 80 metres from the Ramblas. The hotel offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with wooden floors, free wired internet and a flat-screen TV.

Barcelona Cathedral and the Boquería Market are 500 metres away. The port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk from the hotel. You can walk to Barceloneta Beach in 20 minutes or take a bus.

Rooms are also heated and have a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

There are many bars, restaurants and galleries near the Barcelona House. The Picasso Museum and fashionable Borne district are a 10-minute walk away.

There is a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage is available.

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Victoria Suites by Marriott
Hotel_Description_Long:
Beautiful and stylish suites located in the heart of Pedralbes, one of the top residential areas of Barcelona and close to one of the city's main business districts.

AC Hotel Victoria Suites is ideal for business travellers due its location, for weekend breaks due its tranquil environment and excellent gastronomy offer as well for families due the spaciousness of the rooms.

It features a large terrace-bar, a high quality restaurant, friendly staff and many other details.

Featuring air conditioning, Casa Abamita offers accommodation in Barcelona. Plaça Catalunya is 600 metres from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The accommodation offers studios and rooms. The studios are equipped with a kitchenette with a ceramic hob. Both roomms and studios have, a  flat-screen TV, microwave and fridge. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Towels and bed linen are featured.

Portal de l'Angel is 600 metres from Casa Abamita, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Casa Abamita.

Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels.

A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation.

Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel.

The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.4 km from Sagrada Familia, Golden Hotel Barcelona provides a rooftop terrace with outdoor swimming pool, jacuzzi and bar. 1.5 km from Port Olympic, the property is also 1.7 km from Sagarda Familia and 1.9 km away from Picasso Museum. There is a gym, a restaurant and a shared lounge.
 All guests staying at the Golden Hotel Barcelona get 1 free entry for person and stay to the spa at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpic@ Suites complex (subject to availability and with prior reservation), located 450 meters away.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property.
Speaking Spanish, Catalan, German and English at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock.
Barcelona El Prat Airport is 15 km from the property.

Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business centre and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Brick Barcelona the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed.

Palau Sant Jordi is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Hotel Brick Barcelona.

Attractively set in the Eixample district of Barcelona, Habitaciones acogedoras is located less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya, a 7-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and 1.4 km from Boqueria Market. It is situated 700 metres from Passeig de Gracia and features a shared kitchen. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 3-minute walk from Casa Batllo.

All units in the bed and breakfast are equipped with a kettle. With a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and a hair dryer, units at the bed and breakfast also boast free WiFi. At the bed and breakfast, every unit is equipped with bed linen and towels.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Tivoli Theatre, Palau de la Musica Catalana and Portal de l'Angel. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Habitaciones acogedoras.

A 10-minute walk from La Pedrera, Sonder l La Casa del Sol is situated in Barcelona and features rooms with free WiFi. Well set in the Gràcia district, this hotel offers rooms with balcony.

The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with free-to-air channels. All rooms have a private bathroom.

Sonder l La Casa del Sol offers a beautiful sun terrace.

Speaking English, Spanish, French and Catalan.

Casa Batllo is 1.3 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Sonder l La Casa del Sol.

INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo is located at the foot of Montjuïc, 7 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Ramblas. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with WiFi.

Refurbished in 2017, the rooms at INNSiDE by Meliá Barcelona Apolo feature smart décor and wooden floors. Each one has a flat-screen TV, minibar, work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast every morning. There is also a snack bar serving light meals in the evenings.

Parallel Metro Station is next to the hotel, connecting you with the Fira Convention Centre in 2 stops.

Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona features a garden, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Barcelona. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. A spa and wellness centre comprising a sauna, an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub, as well as a terrace can be used by all guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms will provide you with a patio and others also have city views. At Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

The accommodation offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast.

Park Güell is 2 km from Hotel Boutique Mirlo Barcelona, while La Pedrera is 3.6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

Located in central Barcelona, 15 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia and Plaza Catalunya Square, Fabrizzio's Petit features a guest kitchen, lounge and terrace. Free Wi-Fi and breakfast are included.

Bright, modern rooms are decorated simply with colourful finishes. Fabrizzio's Petit offers shared and private rooms with access to 4 shared bathrooms. Bed linen and towels are provided.

The shared kitchen is equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine. There is also a lounge with computers, a flat-screen TV, a PlayStation, Wii and films.

You will receive a map, and staff can provide tourist information. They can organize bicycle rental, walking tours, and night-time activities.

Many bars, restaurants and supermarkets can be found in the surrounding streets. Girona Metro Station is a 3-minute walk from the property. Airport trains leave from Passeig de Gracia Train Station, 5 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel_Name: Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento
Hotel_Description_Long:
Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa.

Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony.

Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

Within 50 metres of La Pedrera and Diagonal Metro Station, Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia features a terrace bar with panoramic views of Barcelona. This 4-star hotel also has an interior garden.

Hotel Royal Passeig de Gracia is set in a restored building with contemporary architecture. The smart bedrooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and a bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

Casa Batlló is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 2 stops from Diagonal Station.

The Gràcia district is within a 5-minute walk, and charming street cafés can be found along the tree-lined Rambla de Catalunya, 200 metres away.

Hostal Santa Ana is located in the very centre of Barcelona, only 240 metres from Plaça Catalunya and 1 minute walk from Portal de l’Angel. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Luggage storage and a safe box are offered, as well as services and tourist information.

Functional rooms have a fan, a sink and heating, featuring a shared or a private bathroom.

There is a wide selection of shops, bars and restaurants in the area, as well as good links with public transport. El Corte Inglés Shopping Centre is 3 minutes’ walk away.

The bus stop with the airport bus line is 300 metres away, as well as the metro station.

Centrally located in Barcelona, just 900 metres from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia, Bed and Bike Barcelona offers private and shared rooms with free WiFi. Tetuan metro Station is 5 minutes’ walk away.

Air-conditioned rooms at this hostel come with a wardrobe and a private or shared bathroom. They include bed linen and lockers. Guests can make use of the shared kitchen and TV area. Bed linen and towels can be rented on site for an additional charge.

Bed and Bike Barcelona offers a bicycle rental service. There is also a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and a ticket service.

The hostel is 900 metres from Arc de Triomf and a 20-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 14 km from Bed and Bike Barcelona.

Set in the heart of Barcelona, Cami Gallery Barcelona is located 3 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, the air-conditioned property has free Wi-Fi.

The stylish rooms feature a bathroom with free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are included.

Located on the first floor of the building, Cami Gallery Barcelona has a shared kitchen available for guests and a daily maid service. Offering a tour desk, the design property is within a 5-minute walk of a wide range of boutiques, bars and Catalan restaurants.

Urquinaona and Catalunya metro stations are 3 minutes’ walk away, while La Barceloneta Beach is 2 stops away by metro. The old town is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Live & Dream features a minimalist white design throughout with bursts of colour in bedding and furniture. This stylish guest house offers free Wi-Fi and internet connection throughout.

Sants Station is 8 minutes' walk away and from here you can get the highspeed AVE Train or the train to the airport. Located 200 metres away, Plaça de Sants Metro Station offers direct access to the Sagrada Familia, La Pedrera and the Ramblas.

The rooms at Live & Dream come with air conditioning. The private bathroom is complete with shampoo and shower gel. A hairdryer can be requested at the reception.

Live & Dream has a tour desk and a ticket service, ideal for planning trips around the city.

Pensión Portugal is located in the centre of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, less than 200 metres from Las Ramblas. This guest house features a 24-hour reception and some rooms with balconies.

The Portugal’s simple rooms have parquet floors and modern, lightly coloured décor. All rooms have a TV, some rooms have a private bathroom and some have a shared bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

Pensión Portugal is within walking distance of many of Barcelona Old Town’s cafés and restaurants. Plaza Reial’s bars and nightclubs are just a 5-minute walk from the guest house.

The Pensión is a few minutes' walk from Barcelona Port and 700 metres from the city’s Cathedral. The guest house is set 200 metres from Drassanes Metro Station, just 2 stops from Plaza de Catalunya Metro and Train Station.

The Hotel Ronda Lesseps is a quiet and familiar establishment, with two beautiful interior terraces full of plants that allow our guests to relax during their stay in our city.

The Hotel is located in the metropolitan heart of Barcelona, with very good communication by public transport, very close to the historic district of Gràcia and just at a ten minutes’ walk from Antoni Gaudí's Park Güell.

License number: HB-004338

Located in Plaça del Pi Square, El Jardi is in the heart of Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. All of the air-conditioned rooms include a safe and TV, and most have a private balcony overlooking the square.

El Jardi is just 2 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas, and 170 metres from Liceu Metro Station. The area around the hotel offers a huge range of restaurants and bars.

Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The hotel offers 24-hour reception, and there is also a vending machine.

El Jardi first opened as a hotel in 1860, and became popular with artists. Today it retains much of its original charm and many of its historic features.

Onix Fira offers a small rooftop pool which is opened from April to October and is not heated, private parking and soundproofed rooms in Barcelona’s centre, overlooking Joan Miró Park. Lively Plaza Espanya is 200 metres away and offers a direct connection to Ramblas.

All of the spacious rooms in the Onix Fira come with free Wi-Fi, a modern décor and a private bathroom. They include a safe, minibar and telephone.

A number of restaurants and bars can be found within a 15-minute walk from the Onix Fira Hotel.

Montjuïc and the Magic Fountains are less than a 10 minutes’ walk away from Fira. The airport bus and Fira Exhibition Centre are 200 metres away.

Please, be aware that swimming pool is not heated and will be opened from April to October.

Hotel_Name: Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House
Hotel_Description_Long:
Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House offers value-for-money and free Wi-Fi on Gran Vía, in Barcelona’s famous Eixample district. It is set 700 metres from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia.

The guesthouse is only 500 metres from Nord Bus Station. There is easy access to Tetuán and Girona Metro Stations.

The guesthouse is set in a historic building it has elegant décor and original features. Guests can enjoy a full equipped shared kitchen and complimentary coffee and tea during the stay.

Casa Consell Gran Via, Guest House is near many famous Modernista buildings. These include Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Família. The Gothic Quarter and the Cathedral are also nearby.

Some rooms have a balcony or terrace with street views. They have an en suite bathroom, with typical ceramic tiles.

Located in Barcelona's attractive Eixample district, U232 Hotel offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is just 150 metres from the hotel.

All of the rooms in Hotel U232 have modern marble bathrooms with powerful showers. Some also have city views and private terraces.

Guests can enjoy drinks, jazz music and city views on the hotel's top-floor terrace. There is also a modern gym on the same floor.

The U232 has a free business centre with an internet terminal. There is an Art Deco-inspired lounge and cocktail bar, decorated with art photography and leather armchairs.

The hotel offers an extensive breakfast buffet. Room service includes daily specials and a pizza delivery service.

The shops and department stores of Diagonal Avenue are just 7 minutes’ walk away. Passeig de Gràcia and Sants Railway Station are both about 20 minutes’ walk away.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design.

The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar.

A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information.

Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square.  There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away.

Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities.

The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

This family-run hotel is located 700 metres from the Politècnica de Catalunya University and Palau Reial Gardens. Bonanova Park offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at the Bonanova Park has a simple, functional design. Rooms come with a CD player, minibar (drinks and snacks not included) and private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied buffet breakfast served in the Bonanova Park’s breakfast room. There are also numerous bars and restaurants in the charming Sarria neighbourhood, a 10-minute walk away.

Hotel Bonanova Park is around 1 km from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, and a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. Maria Cristina Metro Station is 500 metres away, and offers direct links to the city centre and to the Palau de Congressos Conference Centre, 2 stops away.

Private parking can be found near the hotel.

Situated on the seafront in Diagonal Mar, the Hesperia Barcelona del Mar (formerly Hesperia del Mar) features stylish rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is a 5-minute walk from the CCIB and Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre.

Air-conditioned rooms at Hesperia Barcelona del Mar come with flat-screen TV, safe, and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries.

The Ramblas and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter are only 5 km from the hotel. Poble Nou Metro Station is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

This small hotel occupies the first floor of a modernist building, just 50 metres from central Barcelona’s famous shopping street, Passeig de Gràcia. It offers elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Air-conditioned rooms at Circa 1905 include a blend of classic and modern features. There is a balcony and private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a breakfast of local produce. Free tea and coffee are offered 24 hours a day.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is just 100 metres away, while you can walk to Casa Batlló in under 5 minutes.

Set in the Eixample district in Barcelona, 500 metres from La Pedrera, The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi throughout the property.

Flat-screen satellite TV, as well as an iPod docking station are offered. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax, while others include views of the garden or city. All rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You will find concierge service at the property.

Plaça Catalunya is 1.4 km from The Conica Deluxe Bed&Breakfast, while Sagrada Familia is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Hostel Friends Barcelona is located on the well-known Gran Vía Avenue in Barcelona, 500 metres from Plaza Espanya Square. Free WiFi access is available and 24-hour reception is featured.

This guest house offers free services like luggage storage and safe box.

Rooms at Friends Barcelona have heating, a fan and a small fridge, as well as a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private bathroom, a balcony and a flat-screen TV, while others have a shared bathroom and a TV. Bed linen and towels are included.

The area has very good public transport links. Rocafort metro station is only a minute on foot. Sagrada Familia Temple is 20 minutes by metro.

SmartRoom Barcelona is an economy hotel located in central Barcelona, 1 km from Sants Train Station. Decorated in a modern style, each room here will provide guests with a flat-screen Smart TV with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms have free WiFi access. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. Extras include a desk and bed linen.
A buffet breakfast is available daily. Other facilities offered at the property include a vending machine with drinks and snacks. At SmartRoom Barcelona, guests will find a 24-hour front desk.
Plaza de Sants is 450 metres from SmartRoom Barcelona and Sants Train Station is 15 minutes' walk away. The hotel is 1.5 km from Camp Nou and Magic Fountain of Montjuïc. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 20 minutes' drive away.

Allegro Barcelona is a futuristic design hotel, situated 100 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station. Its stylish rooms include free Wi-Fi, digital radio and LCD TV with satellite channels.

Each room at Allegro Barcelona features elegant white décor with colourful touches. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with an electronic safe. Bathrooms include a hairdryer and toiletries.

A continental breakfast buffet is served until 10:30 each day at Allegro Barcelona. Numerous tapas bars and pavement cafés can be found on Rambla de Catalunya, a 5-minute walk away.

Other facilities include portable WiFi for no charge.

The famous Gaudi buildings and designer shops of Passeig de Gracia are just 500 metres from the hotel, while Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk away. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Barcelona, recommend excursions and arrange airport transfers.

Situated in Barcelona, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 800 metres from the centre, Casa Lolita features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The property is set 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach, 1 km from Palau de la Musica Catalana and 700 metres from Tivoli Theatre. The accommodation offers a lift, a shared kitchen and luggage storage for guests.

At the guest house, every unit is fitted with a wardrobe. Some units have a balcony and/or a patio with city or inner courtyard views. All units in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with streaming services and with satellite channels.

Popular points of interest near the guest house include Passeig de Gracia, Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and Casa Batllo. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from Casa Lolita.

Located in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya, Praktik Vinoteca hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi in public areas. Universitat Metro Station is 7 minutes’ walk away.

The bright and soundproofed rooms at Praktik Vinoteca feature wooden floors, a flat-screen satellite TV, telephone and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property has a terrace where you can enjoy a glass of wine served by the on-site wine expert, who can tell you about local wines and their history.

You will find bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets. Paseo de Gracia, with its shops and impressive architecture, is just 600 metres away.

Barcelona Airport is a 45-minute bus ride away from Plaza Catalunya and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km from Praktik Vinoteca.

This boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia. It offers a free bicycle use, free WiFi

Each room at the ICON Bcn by Petit Palace features modern décor, a flat-screen TV and a shower.

Guests will find a bar and a restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and reception is open 24 hours a day. The hotel also offers a scooter hire service, subject to availability.

ICON Bcn by Petit Palace is just 7 minutes’ walk from the Gothic Quarter, where you can find the Palau de la Música Catalana. Urquinaona and Paseo de Gracia Metro are less than 5 minutes’ walk away. Gaudi's La Pedrera is 750 metres away, and you can walk to Ciutadella Park in 15 minutes.

This boutique guest house is set in Barcelona’s chic Eixample district, 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers air-conditioned rooms, most with a balcony, 200 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

Set in a restored 19th century building, rooms at Violeta Boutique feature contemporary décor. All include city views, free Wi-Fi, a plasma TV and a spacious private bathroom.

There is a terrace where you can relax and there are several bars, restaurants and shops within 5 minutes’ walk. Las Ramblas are just 7 minutes’ walk away.

Violeta Boutique is 250 metres from Passeig de Gracia, with its exclusive shops and Gaudí monuments. You can walk to the Palau de la Musica Catalana and the bohemian Born area in 5 minutes. Estació del Nord Bus Station and Ciutadella Park are both 15 minutes' walk away.

El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns.

Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe.

The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

This value-for-money hotel is located in central Barcelona, just off La Rambla and next to La Boquería market. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at Hotel Aneto feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each one has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Hairdryers are available on request.

There is a wide variety of restaurants in the surrounding area.

Buses to the airport leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 7 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Set just off Avinguda Parallel and a 5-minute walk from the nearest Metro station, Hostal Apolo features rooms with free Wi-Fi. It has a 24-hour reception and luggage storage.

Each simply decorated, modern room at Hostal Apolo has a flat-screen TV. There is also heating and either private or shared bathrooms. Some rooms have a balcony.

There is a selection of cafes and bars in the streets surrounding the Apolo. Restaurants can be found around Las Ramblas, a 10-minute walk away.

The funicular railway leading to Montjuïc Park leaves from nearby Parallel Metro Station. Plaza España and the Magic Fountains can be reached in 20 minutes by foot.

Situated 100 metres from Universitat Metro Station, this boutique hotel offers stylish rooms with free tea and coffee making facilities. Plaza Catalunya is just 400 metres away.

Each air-conditioned room at chic&basic Reding has flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. Rooms come with a minibar, a trouser press and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer, a magnifying mirror and toiletries.

chic&basic Reding has a business centre with a computer and printer. The hotel has free internet connection points. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide visitor information and help to arrange restaurant reservations or car rental.

chic&basic Reding is a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas. Direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop just 450 metres away, in Plaza Catalunya.

Just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Ramblas, Hostal Levante Barcelona offers free WiFi and a 24-hour reception. Air-conditioned and heated rooms have a private bathroom, fan and work desk.

Hostal Levante Barcelona guest house has a vending machine where drinks are available. Many cafés and restaurants can be found in the immediate surroundings.

Luggage storage is offered and there is a safe for guest use. The multilingual staff can help with things to see and do in Barcelona. Lively Plaça Reial is just 100 metres away.

Apartments Sixtyfour are situated on Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, opposite the famous Gaudi building, Casa Batlló. These design apartments have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

Apartments Sixtyfour are a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya Square and Las Ramblas. The apartments are next to Passeig de Gracia Station. This Metro and train station offers direct links to Barcelona Airport. The property offers information on other touristic options in the city.

Each apartment has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Living areas come with a double sofa bed. The stylish kitchens include an oven, ceramic hob and dishwasher.

A continental breakfast is served in a cafeteria nearby.

Bed linen and towels are included in all apartments. Basic cleaning products and cooking items are also provided. Several supermarkets can be found within 800 metres of the apartments.

Blanc Guest House is 8 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers an attractive terrace and smart rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV.

The rooms at Blanc Guest House are decorated in white, with parquet floors and white furniture. Each one comes with air conditioning, heating and a fan, and some have a private bathroom.

Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Car rental is also available from the front desk.

The Blanc is 8 minutes’ walk from Diagonal Metro Station, connecting you with the rest of the city with ease. Plaza Catalunya is just 2 stops away.

Well set in Barcelona, Hotel Raval House provides air-conditioned rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. 2.5 km from Sant Sebastian Beach and 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Barceloneta Beach.

At the hotel, every room comes with a wardrobe. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, certain units at Hotel Raval House also provide guests with a city view. All units at the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are willing to help at any time of the day.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Raval House include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

This modern hotel offers free WiFi and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. NH Barcelona Eixample is 400 metres from Hospital Clínic Metro Station, in the Eixample district.

The NH Barcelona Eixample is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Plaza Catalunya Square. Barcelona Sants Train Station is within 2 Metro stops, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Família Church is 3 stops away.

Rooms at the NH Barcelona Eixample feature simple, functional décor and wooden floors. They all include a minibar and a selection of pillows. The marble bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries.

The hotel’s breakfast buffet includes typical pastries, fresh fruit and Spanish cured ham.

A 5-minute walk from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas, H10 Urquinaona Plaza features a roof terrace with a small seasonal pool. It is set next to Urquinaona Metro Station.

H10 Urquinaona Plaza is set in a restored 19th-century building and features smart, contemporary décor. The chic rooms have minimalist design, free Wi-Fi, a Nespresso coffee maker, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV.

This H10 also features a restaurant, a bar and a lounge with a library. You can enjoy great city views from the roof terrace.

The Palau de la Música Catalana is a short walk away and the charming Born district is within 1 km of the hotel. The airport bus stop and Catalunya Metro and Railway Station are less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Ideally situated in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Heart of Barcelona Rooms is situated 2.3 km from Somorrostro Beach, 2.4 km from Barceloneta Beach and 400 metres from Plaça Catalunya. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as Palau de la Musica Catalana, Portal de l'Angel, and Cathedral of Barcelona. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 2.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also feature free WiFi. All rooms at Heart of Barcelona Rooms have air conditioning and a desk.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tivoli Theatre, Passeig de Gracia and Passeig de Gracia Metro Station. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Heart of Barcelona Rooms.

Hotel_Name: Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia 4 Sup
Hotel_Description_Long:
Located right on Plaça Catalunya Square in Barcelona, Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia offers a terrace with a pool and free WiFi throughout. Private parking is available on site.

Awarded as Hotel Monument by the Gremi d'Hotels of Barcelona

Rooms are spacious and come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms offer city views.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property and there is a restaurant and a bar on site.

Barcelona's La Rambla is 300 metres from Iberostar Selection Paseo de Gracia, while Paseo de Gracia, with its trendy shops and restaurants, is just 50 metres away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool.

The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities.

The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property.

Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental.

The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

Situated on the central, tree-lined Rambla Catalunya, this boutique hotel is set in a stunning 19th-century palace. It maintains authentic features such as Baroque-style columns and colourful ceramic floors.

The chic rooms at the Praktik Rambla feature a minimalist design and come with air conditioning. They also include free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom, decorated with striking green tiles.

The hotel offers a terrace with comfortable sofas where guests can relax. From June to September, free fruit juice is served on the terrace from 16:00 to 20:00 every day.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 200 metres away from the Praktik Rambla. Barcelona’s famous Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops.

One of Barcelona’s tallest buildings, this design hotel offers spectacular views over the city and sea. Melia Barcelona Sky features an outdoor swimming pool. Treatments are available at the Serena SPA Wellness and free access is offered to the gym.

Each spacious room at Melia Barcelona Sky includes a 32-inch plasma-screen TV and offers city views. The stylish bathrooms come with a rain shower.

You can enjoy a cocktail on the 24th floor, at the Skyline 24 Panoramic Terrace, which offers views over the city.

El Merkado Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine, and you can enjoy a cocktail on its terrace. WiFi is free in all areas.

Located in the lively area of Poblenou, Melia Barcelona Sky is just 200 metres from Poble Nou Metro Station. The Forum and the International Convention Centre are within a 15-minute walk. The Mar Bella beach is only 10 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi.

The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours.

The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu.

The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away.

Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested.

There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries.

Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option.

The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees.

The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

Ecozentric is located in central Barcelona, just 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló. This eco-friendly property offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and an LED TV.

The rooms at Ecozentric feature soundproofing and air conditioning. The TVs are low consumption, and the bed sheets are made of organic cotton. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower.

The guest house offers free tea, coffee and biscuits throughout the day. There is a lounge where you can relax.

MACBA Modern Art Museum and the Raval district are a 7-minute walk from Ecozentric, and you can walk to the Boqueria Market and Palau de la Música Auditorium in 13 minutes. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Ecozentric donates part of every booking to the reforestation of woodland.

This hostel, renovated in 2023, is set just a short distance from Las Ramblas, in the heart of Barcelona. It offers good value accommodation, in an ideal location for exploring the city.

Somnio Hostels is set next to Barcelona University. The famous buildings of Passeig de Gracia are just 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Station is also nearby.

Somnio offers cosy single and double rooms. All rooms and bathrooms are stylish and functional. There is free WiFi access in the whole hostel.

Hostel staff can provide information on the city. This is an ideal place for travellers to share experiences and plan excursions.

This pleasant guest house is set behind La Boqueria Market, 100 metres from Las Ramblas. It offers bright rooms, a free Wi-Fi zone and 24-hour reception.

La Palmera’s air-conditioned rooms feature smart decor and laminate floors. All have a sink and bathrooms are shared or private. Sheets and towels are included.

The guest house offers coffee, tea and cold drinks for sale at reception. There are numerous bars, restaurants and shops within 2 minutes’ walk and Plaza Real Square is 300 metres away.

Hostal la Palmera is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral in the Gothic Quarter, while Gaudi’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 20 minutes’ walk away.

Hostal la Palmera is 2 minutes’ walk from Liceu Metro Station. Direct buses to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Plaza Catalunya Square, 600 metres away and Port Vell is 10 minutes’ away by foot

Hotel_Name: TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel 4* Sup- Adults Only
Hotel_Description_Long:
Offering a rooftop pool with a large sun terrace, TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel is located in the heart of the gay district of Barcelona, 2 km from Barceloneta Beach.

The hetero-friendly hotel offers on-site private parking. There is also a  24-hour reception and guests can get information on the gay scene and the city at the on-site tour desk. On the rooftop guests will also find the Sky bar, gym, steam bath and a massage room.

Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A safety deposit box and a universal phone charger are also provided.

Guests can sample a drink at the rooftop bar, whilst taking in stunning city views or enjoy the delicious cocktails served in the Lounge Bar. A buffet breakfast is available and free high-speed WiFi access is provided throughout.

Staff can give information about the surrounding area, which is known as "Gayxample" because of its lively gay nightlife.

The hotel is 2 minutes' walk from Rocafort Metro Station and Plaça d'Espanya, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport, is a 10-minute walk away. Paral·lel, with bars, restaurants, clubs and theatres is 1.3 km from TWO Hotel Barcelona by Axel.

Located in Barcelona, 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel Paxton Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona each room comes with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At Hotel Paxton Barcelona you will find a restaurant serving Italian and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Port Olimpic. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 16 km from Hotel Paxton Barcelona.

Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium.

The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning.  Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities.

The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant  Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available.

Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away.

Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access.

The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar.

Hotel Derby features Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

Located 5 minutes’ walk from Les Corts Metro Station, this hotel offers modern accommodation in Barcelona. It has good access to the city's main attractions, such as the Nou Camp Football Stadium.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Barcelona Les Corts feature contemporary décor, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private balcony or terrace. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries.

The hotel operates a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Helpful staff can organise bicycle and car rental, as well as provide information on Barcelona.

NH Les Corts is less than 10 minutes’ walk from Sants Train Station, providing access to Barcelona Airport. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away. Barcelona Airport is 15 km from the property.

Centrally located, Som Nit Triomf features rooms with free WiFi and private bathroom. It is 800 metres from Ramblas and Plaza Catalunya as well as from Barcelona North Bus Station.

Rooms are fitted with traditional Catalan Modernist tiles and they all have a wardrobe. Some rooms have a balcony with city views. A kettle and ironing facilities are available on prior request at reception.

There is a plenty of restaurants, shops and trendy bars in the surrounding area and a 24-hour supermarket can be found 200 metres away.

Som Nit Triomf is located between the Eixample and Borne District, 450 metres from Arc de Triomf and Urquinaona Metro Stations.  You can walk to fashionable Passeig de Gracia in 10 minutes and the tree-lined Passeig de Companys connected to Ciutadella Park is just 150 metres away.

Centrally located, Hostalin Barcelona Gran Via boasts 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi. Passeig de Gracia is 600 metres away and some rooms have a balcony.

Fitted with wooden flooring all the air-conditioned room features a flat-screen TV. Rooms comes with a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and hair straightener. Bed linen and towels are also provided.

The property features a shared lounge area with sofas, computers with internet access, a TV and vending machines. A shared fridge is also available.

There is a plenty of bars, restaurants, shops and outlet open till late In the surrounding area. You can also find fresh produce at La Concepción Market, 500 metres away.

Set in the Eixample District, Hostalin Barcelona Gran Via is well served by public transports. There are 2 different metro stations, with different lines, 250 metres from the guest house. Barcelona North Bus Station connected to Girona Costa Brava Airport is 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel_Name: Hotel Granados 83, a Member of Design Hotels
Hotel_Description_Long:
Located 250 metres from Barcelona’s Diagonal Metro Station, Granados 83 offers a small gym and roof terrace with a small pool and cocktail bar. Rooms feature Zen-style design and LCD TV.

This design hotel has an impressive glass and stone façade and it combines neoclassical details with industrial and natural components which has become representative of the entire city and which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It also features beautiful Art Deco interiors.

Decorated with wood, leather and glass, the Granados 83’s stylish air-conditioned rooms include a minibar, bathrobe and slippers.

There are many popular tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, on Rambla de Catalunya.

Passeig de Gràcia is 400 metres away, and is home to Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

There is a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge.

Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel is set in  Barcelona, 200 metres from the Cathedral of Barcelona and offers a terrace with an outdoor pool with views of the Cathedral and a spa. Portal de l'Angel is 200 metres away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned, soundproofed and features a flat-screen TV and a Nespresso Coffee Machine. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property, There is also a spa with a hot tub and a gym. The hotel offers show-cooking during breakfast.

Plaça Catalunya is 400 metres from Catalonia Magdalenes Hotel, while Picasso Museum is 600 metres away. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

Hotel_Name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
Hotel_Description_Long:
Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV.

The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

Located in Barcelona, 1.7 km from Bogatell, The Hoxton, Poblenou provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.

Guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle.

Guests at The Hoxton, Poblenou can enjoy a à la carte breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Nova Icaria, Mar Bella and Sagrada Familia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from The Hoxton, Poblenou.

This minimalist hotel is situated in the Poble Nou district of Barcelona, 15 minutes’ by foot from Bogatell Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool surrounded by wooden decking and loungers.

The suites at Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites feature monochrome decoration and a flat-screen TV. They also include air conditioning and a modern bathroom.

The Hotel & Spa Villa Olimpica Suites complex offers a stylish café-bar and restaurant. Guests can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine from the á la carte and daily menus. In summer meals can be enjoyed on the terrace by the pool.

Guests have access to the hotel's large spa for an additional cost. It includes an indoor treatment pool, Finnish sauna, Turkish baths, jacuzzis, hot tubs, several types of shower and an ice fountain. There is also a gym.

Barcelona Port is 15 minutes' walk away and Bogatell Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel. Guests can walk to the lively Villa Olimpica area in 5 minutes.

All rooms include 1 complimentary access per person per stay to the hotel spa (subject to availability and upon reservation).

Catalonia Gran Via BCN is set on Gran Vía and within 5 minutes’ walk of Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations, and beside the airport bus stop. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the modern rooms at Catalonia Gran Via BCN is themed around a different city and air travel. All rooms have flat-screen TVs with satellite channels and an iPod docking station.

You can enjoy breakfast in Catalonia Gran Via BCN, while à la carte options are offered in the Gourmet Corner.

You can walk to both Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas in 10 minutes. Plaza de España, the Magic Fountains and the FIRA are just 2 stops from Urgell Station.

Zenit Borrell is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, 15 minutes’ walk from the stylish Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers modern, soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV.

The Marés restaurant offers Mediterranean and international cuisine, and has an elegant outdoor terrace. There is also a bar with a large TV screen.

All rooms at the Zenit Borrell have air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathrooms come equipped with a hairdryer.

The tour desk can provide useful information on Barcelona and the surrounding area. The hotel is 12 minutes from Plaza Catalunya and the Ramblas by metro, while the Hospital Clinic Metro Station and hospital are 200 metres way from the hotel.

Stylish, modern apartments include free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and views of Barcelona. Located just off Diagonal Avenue, C211 Barcelona is 15 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gracia.

Each apartment includes a lounge with sofas, a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an iPad docking station. Their kitchens are equipped with an oven, microwave and washing machine; bed linen and towels are provided. Some also feature a balcony or terrace.

Many shops, restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. The local Galvany Market is a 5-minute walk from the apartments.

Both Hospital Clinic and Diagonal metro stations are under 15 minutes’ walk away and connect with Sants Train Station and the rest of the city.

Featuring a roof terrace and free Wi-Fi, Flor Parks is set on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station. Located 200 metres from La Boqueria Market, it offers soundproofed rooms.

The Flor Parks' air-conditioned rooms have a balcony, satellite TV and a minibar. Their private bathrooms have hairdryers and some have hydromassage baths.

Set menu and à la carte dishes are served at the Hotel Flor’s restaurant. A continental breakfast is available. There is also a snack bar and café.

The hotel’s central location makes it perfect for exploring the city’s Gothic Quarter and Barcelona Cathedral is just 10 minutes’ walk away. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are less than 1 km from the Flor Parks.

Hotel Lleó is situated next to Barcelona's Plaza Catalunya and the famous Las Ramblas. It has a small rooftop pool with sun terrace and loungers, free Wi-Fi access and rooms with flat-screen TVs.

The Hotel Lleó is elegantly decorated with polished floors, glass features and attractive lighting throughout. Its air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have fridges and satellite TV.

The restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine. It also serves a daily breakfast from 07:00 until 11:00.

The Lleó has a lounge area and snack bar, where guests can relax with a drink.

Hotel Lleó is within walking distance of many of Barcelona's attractions and Las Ramblas is just a minute's walk away. The nearest Metro Station is 100 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the Sagrada Familia, within 10 minutes.

Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro.

It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities.

The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee.
There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks.

The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas.

Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel.

Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment.

The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours.

This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

Located just off Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, Gallery Hotel offers a free sauna and gym, and a seasonal rooftop terrace with a pool and city views. Rooms include free Wi-Fi and free water on arrival.

This elegant hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. The modern bathrooms include amenities, a hairdryer and a bathrobe.

The Gallery’s restaurant has an attractive garden terrace where you can enjoy Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel also has a bar and a café.

Gallery Hotel is situated next to the gardens of Palau Robert, a gallery and tourist information centre. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is a 3-minute walk away, while nearby Diagonal Metro Station provides direct access to the Sagrada Familia. Regular airport trains stop 600 metres away at Passeig de Gracia Station.

Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath.

The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV.

The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor.

The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot.

The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

Hotel_Name: Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa- Adults Only
Hotel_Description_Long:
The area around the Hotel Axel Barcelona is known as the Gay-xample because of its lively gay scene. The staff has knowledge of the local gay scene, and the hotel is hetero-friendly too.

Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, this design hotel is close to Passeig de Gràcia's exclusive boutiques. The Axel Hotel’s 500m² Spa Centre includes a hydromassage pool and saunas, and the modern rooms have flat-screen satellite TVs.

The Axel’s Sky Bar features a large swimming pool, a terrace with a hot tub and a cocktail bar. Here you will find parties, art exhibitions and shows.

The Axel Hotel Barcelona & Urban Spa offers easy access to the Ramblas, the Picasso Museum and Gothic Quarter. The hotel occupies an attractive 19th-century building.

Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests.

At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box.

Buffet and continental breakfast options are available each morning at Nobu Hotel Barcelona.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona.

Hotel_Name: Gran Hotel Havana 4Sup by Escampa Hotels
Hotel_Description_Long:
This elegant, design hotel is set in Barcelona’s city centre, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a sauna and a seasonal rooftop pool with a terrace.

The Gran Hotel Havana is located in Casa Fradera, a historic building dating from 1882. Rooms are decorated in a classic style and feature a marble bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

The Grand Place restaurant serves traditional cuisine, and in summer guests can enjoy light meals on the hotel’s rooftop bar-terrace.

Please note that the rooftop bar-terrace may be closed to the public at certain times due to private events.

Girona Metro Station is 200 metres away while the stylish Paseo de Gracia is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, with many shops, bars and restaurants.

Set in a striking, contemporary building on Passeig de Gràcia and facing Gaudí’s La Pedrera, Suites Avenue offers stylish accommodation. It features an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna.

Each of the Avenue’s apartments has simple, chic décor with parquet floors and leather sofas. All apartments have a large kitchen with an oven, fridge and dishwasher. Free Wi-Fi is available.

The property has a concierge service, which guests can use to arrange excursions, beauty treatments and babysitting.

The apartments are a 5-minute walk from a selection of upmarket shops and close to a range of cafés and restaurants.

Casa Batlló is 5 minutes’ walk from the apartments, while Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over 1 km away. Diagonal Metro Station is a 2-minute walk from the Suites.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper offers 5-star luxury next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port. It is just 100 metres from the beach, with free Wi-Fi and 2 outdoor pools.

This modern hotel has spacious bedrooms, with 55' Smart TVs and DVD players. They have an elegant bathroom with rain shower.

The Sofitel Barcelona Skipper has a rooftop pool, with impressive views of the city and sea; and a large seasonal terrace with sun loungers.

The hotel has 2 seasonal cocktail bars; while the Tendiez Bar, a modern bar with an outdoor terrace, is open all year round.

The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Ciutadella Vila Olimpica Metro Station, just 2 stops from the historic city centre. Barcelona Zoo and the pretty Ciutadella Park are also nearby.

Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV.

Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast.

Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day.

Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

Hotel_Name: Hotel SOFIA Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt
Hotel_Description_Long:
Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment.

Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers.

The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace.

Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away.

Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists.

Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot

We only accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. We do not accept any other pets

For pets.
Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed.
Pets must comply with current health regulations.
They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas.
€100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee)
€25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

Generator Barcelona is located 500 metres from the fashionable Passeig de Gracia Avenue. The hostel offers a 24-hour reception, free private lockers in shared dormitories and free Wi-Fi in public areas.

Diagonal and Verdaguer metro stations are within 5 minutes’ walk from Generator Barcelona. The Gràcia district, which has plenty of boutique shops and bars, is only 200 metres away.

Both private rooms and dormitories have air conditioning and heating, as well as individual power sockets and reading lamps for each bed. Female-only dormitories include hairdryers and other amenities.

They also feature an en suite bathroom, a sink and a mirror. Bed linen is included, while towels can be rented at the reception. Dormitories are available for guests over 18 years old.

Guests can have a daily breakfast for an extra cost. Generator Barcelona also has a communal lounge and a luggage storage service.

This pleasant guest house is located in the very heart of Barcelona, few metres from the Ramblas and the Plaza Catalunya Square. It features rooms with simple décor and free Wi-Fi throughout.

All rooms at Pensión Dani are comfortable and include a fan. Some of them have flat-screen TVs and a private bathroom.

Pensión Dani has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk where staff can provide tourist information about the area.

Numerous bars and restaurants serving national and international food can be found nearby. The main shopping district is just few metres away.

Barcelona’s main tourist attractions can be reach either walking or by public transport. Universitat or Catalunya Metro Stations are less than 5 minutes‘ walk from the guest house.

Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi.

The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport.

All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail.

Do you already know the  Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner.

The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc.

The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology.

This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

Boasting a terrace, The Moods Oasis is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 1.1 km from La Pedrera and 1.5 km from Casa Batllo. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At The Moods Oasis the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

The Moods Oasis provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from The Moods Oasis.

Housed in a traditional 19th-century building, this hotel is located between Plaza de Catalunya and Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter. It offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool surrounded by painted murals.

The Catalonia Portal de l'Angel maintains much of its original design. It features comfortable rooms with air conditioning, satellite TV and coffee and tea facilities. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily from 07:30 to 11:00 at Catalonia Portal de l'Angel.

The famous Las Ramblas is less than 200 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral is 100 metres from the hotel. The Portal de l'Angel is just a 5-minute walk from Catalunya Metro and Railway Station.

This stylish design hotel is located 150 metres from Rocafort Metro Station in Barcelona. It offers a trendy rooftop bar and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and plasma satellite TV.

The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Villa Emilia feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one has a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Hotel Villa Emilia Barcelona’s restaurant serves creative Catalan food, and there is a weekly barbecue. The Villa Emilia Bistrot offers live music.

Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. There are also car and bicycle rental services at the front desk.

Hotel Villa Emilia is just 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza Espanya, where you can find the Fira Convention Centre. Sants Station is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Located in the quiet San Gervasi district of Barcelona, this elegant hotel offers modern rooms with free internet connection. The Silken is just 8 minutes by train from Plaza Catalunya.

The restaurant at Silken San Gervasi offers traditional cuisine with modern influences. A breakfast buffet is served in the cafeteria, and drinks and snacks are also available throughout the day.

Functional rooms include a free safe and central heating and air conditioning. The marble bathroom is complete with a hairdryer.

Silken St. Gervasi is a 15-minute walk from Park Guell, with impressive structures, mosaics and architecture by Antoni Gaudí. El Putxet Station can be found 50 metres from the hotel with direct access to the city centre.

Located 400 metres from Sants Station in Barcelona, NH Sants Barcelona offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The hotel has a restaurant, serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a relaxing café-bar. It also offers a healthy breakfast. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

The NH Sants Barcelona is set in a quiet area of Barcelona's Les Corts Financial District, but Barcelona city centre is within 15 minutes by Metro. Guests can reach FC Barcelona Football Stadium from Plaça del Centre Metro Station, which is 300 metres away.

The Acta Antibes is set in Barcelona’s Eixample District, 10 minutes’ walk from the Sagrada Familia. This hotel features a 24-hour reception, buffet breakfast and free Wi-Fi.

Each of the Acta Antibes’s rooms has simple, stylish décor and wooden flooring. All air-conditioned rooms have a TV and a desk.

Whilst visiting the city’s tourist attractions, guests at the Antibes can make use of its luggage storage. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request.

The hotel is ideally located for visiting sights such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera, which are around 20 minutes’ walk away.
