Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are just over one kilometre away. The nearest Metro station, Monumental, is just 200 metres from the hotel.

This iconic, Modernist building is located at the head of Barcelona’s chic Passeig de Gracia Avenue. It has a sauna and gym, and a roof terrace with a pool and excellent views.

The luxurious Casa Fuster is a monument in itself, built in 1908 by the Modernist architect, Lluis Domènech i Montaner, and has the status of Speciality Monument. His work, including the hotel, is a designated UNESCO World Heritage Site.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms at Casa Fuster G.L Monumento feature satellite TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some rooms have a hydro-massage bath.

The Casa Fuster Hotel has a stylish restaurant, which serves Mediterranean cuisine. Room service is available, and there is a jazz bar and rooftop chill-out bar.

There is a concierge service and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium offers stylish, modern accommodation in a quiet area of central Barcelona. It has free WiFi, a sauna, gym and roof terrace with swimming pool and city views.

Bedrooms at the hotel are spacious and air conditioned. They all have a choice of pillows, a minibar and satellite TV. Each room comes with a Barcelona city guidebook.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium combines a 19th-Century façade with modern interior design. It is surrounded by other Modernist buildings in Barcelona’s Eixample district.

The hotel is set 800 metres from Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas, near the city’s Gothic Quarter. Ciutadella Park and the Olympic Port are also within walking distance.

The NH Collection Podium Hotel has good access to all parts of the city by public transport. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

NH Collection Barcelona Pódium's restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and there is also a lounge bar. A healthy breakfast is available in the mornings. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, Hostal Benidorm offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Liceu Metro Station is just 200 metres away.

Each room at the Benidorm Hostal features simple décor and tiled floors. All rooms have central heating and a private bathroom.

Drinks and snacks are available from vending machines in the Benidorm’s reception area. Staff at the front desk can provide information about the city and arrange car or bicycle rental.

Hostal Benidorm is located just outside the historic Gothic Quarter. Gaudi’s Palau Güell is 100 metres away, while the Boqueria Market is within 400 metres. Barceloneta Beach can be reached in 25 minutes’ walk or a 10-minute bus.

The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs.

The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box.

A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work.

Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

Astoria is just off Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from Diagonal Metro Station and Paseo de Gracia Avenue. It features a rooftop pool with views, and a gym.

The Astoria Hotel combines original Art Nouveau features with modern facilities. Air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV, a safe and minibar. They feature wooden floors and free Wi-Fi, and the modern bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The restaurant at the Astoria offers traditional Catalan cuisine, and room service is available. There is also a terrace and a bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk

Hotel Market is located next to Barcelona’s San Antonio Market, 10 minutes' walk from MACBA Gallery. Its chic rooms have rain showers and free Wi-Fi, and there is a popular restaurant.

The Market Hotel’s modern rooms have dark wood beams, white walls and large windows. Each one has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony or terrace.

The hotel is 15 minutes’ walk from both Plaza Espanya and Plaza Catalunya. Sant Antoni Metro Station is about 200 metres away, and an airport shuttle bus stop can be found 2 minutes’ away.

The Market Hotel’s elegant restaurant offers a range of modern Catalan dishes, and specializes in rice.

Hotel_Name: Hotel Gran Derby Suites, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Hotel_Description_Long:
This lovely red-brick building is perfectly situated in a quiet area of Barcelona, and boasts an outdoor swimming pool and a fantastic collection of lithographs by Picasso, Dalí, Tàpies and others.

Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Gran Derby Suites features flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer.

These two separate spaces allow guests to comfortably host visitors, hold meetings or work in their sophisticated rooms.

Sit back and relax around the outdoor swimming pool, where you will enjoy views of the pretty gardens.

The tour desk/ticket service and free wired internet make it easy to plan your days in Barcelona.

Take a short metro journey into the city centre, or enjoy the tourist bus, which stops right next to the Gran Derby.

You can also stroll along to the fashionable Avinguda Diagonal. Here you will find the huge L'Illa shopping centre, and a succession of stylish boutiques.

Hotel Gran Derby shares with Hotel Derby the Italian pizzeria Santa Napoli and the cocktail bar with Peruvian nuances Lima Bruja.

Set in Barcelona, less than 1 km from Bogatell Beach, Acta Voraport offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features an ATM, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box and some rooms also feature city views. At Acta Voraport the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Catalan, English, Spanish and French.

Popular points of interest near Acta Voraport include Mar Bella Beach, Nova Icaria Beach and Somorrostro Beach. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access.

This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards.

Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site.

Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

Situated above Barcelona Sants Train Station, Barceló Sants offers a subtle outer space theme throughout. Minimalist rooms feature free Wi-Fi, rain showers, and large windows with city views.

Air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor and designer furniture. Each has an iPod dock, flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

This design hotel includes a fitness centre.

The hotel has the Oxygen restaurant, where you can enjoy a delicious, complete and healthy breakfast buffet. It also has the Orbital Bar, the ideal space to disconnect from daily life; a fun and perfect place to have a delicious cocktail with your partner or to hang out and have a drink with colleagues after a long working day.

Sants Train and Metro Station offers direct access to Barcelona Airport, and the historic city centre, 3.5 km away. There are also high-speed AVE services to Madrid and international trains.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge and the hotel has a Wi-Fi zone.

Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer.

Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away.

The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

Stay in the refined elegance of the classic Hotel Continental Palacete, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace. Located right in the heart of Barcelona it is just 350 metres from Plaza Catalunya.

Guests have access to a free, 24-hour continental buffet with a variety of food and drinks.

Continental Palacete features luxurious, Baroque decor, with priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes.

Modern, air-conditioned rooms have free high-speed WiFi access, satellite TV, a fridge and a microwave. Their private bathrooms come with a hairdryer.

The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the city’s main square of Plaça Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelona’s distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.

This guest house offers free Wi-Fi in a location by Barcelona Port. Yomo Hostal BCN Port is just 100 metres from Las Ramblas and 400 metres from the Gothic Quarter.

Paral•lel Metro is a short walk away. This offers direct access to Plaça Catalunya, Plaça Espanya and the Sagrada Familia. The funicular to Montjuic also leaves from here.

The guest house is set opposite the Cruise Terminals, 10 minutes from Barcelona Beach. There are many buses and bicycle lanes nearby.

All rooms at the Yomo Hostal BCN Port have a TV, heating and air conditioning. Standard rooms are en suite and economy rooms have a shared bathroom.

Family rooms and rooms for disabled guests are available. Daily cleaning is provided.

Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi. It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status.

All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool.

A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available.

Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym.

The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away.

The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

Featuring a rootop pool, this boutique hotel is located in Barcelona’s historic centre, close to Palau de la Música Concert Hall, the Cathedral and the Ramblas.

Ohla Barcelona features rooms with contemporary décor and large windows. They all include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The modern bathrooms come with bathrobes and slippers. Some rooms have views over the historic Gothic Quarter.

Romain Fornell is currently the head chef for all the culinary spaces at hotel Ohla Barcelona: Caelis restaurant, Vistro49, and La Plassohla. This last restaurant is specialised in catalan cuisine, offers tapas and small dishes. Guests can also have a cocktail in the famous Ohla rooftop bar.

The rooftop swimming pool offers fantastic city views with a chill out terrace. Other facilities at this hotel include a gym and a wellness area with a sauna.

The Ohla Barcelona is 300 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square while Urquinaona Metro Station is only 200 metres away. Passeig de Gracia Avenue and Gaudi’s modernist buildings are 10 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi.

Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe.

The hotel has 24-hour room service.

Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

A 15-minute walk from Gaudí's Sagrada Família, Catalonia Sagrada Familia is just 300 metres from Clot Metro and Train Station. It features a restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and a gym.

The Catalonia Sagrada Familia features traditional, bright décor and its rooms are have a desk, a mini fridge with complimentary water and a safety deposit box. Free Wi-Fi access is available.
All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

The restaurant serves a range of Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine, as well as a buffet breakfast. The café-bar offers a selection of drinks and snacks throughout the day and there is also a bar.

Car hire is available on site, and staff at the Catalonia Sagrada Familia’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Barcelona and its many attractions. The hotel is 200 metres from the Torre Agbar Tower.

Clot Metro Station connects guests to the city centre in 4 stops and the airport train also stops here.

Overlooking Camp Nou Stadium and Diagonal Avenue, the modern NH Barcelona Stadium offers free WiFi, a gym and seasonal rooftop pool. The air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, minibar and a pillow menu.

NH Barcelona Stadium Hotel’s seasonal sun terrace offers wonderful views across Barcelona to Montjuic. It also has sun loungers.

The hotel’s restaurant, Acanto, offers a varied buffet breakfast, as well as an á la carte lunch menu. The lobby café is open until midnight every day. The restaurant is closed during summer months.

Les Corts Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk away and offers a direct link to Barcelona’s historic centre. Diagonal Avenue can be reached in 10 minutes on foot, and Sants Station is 1.5 km away.

Barcelona's Fira Congress Centre is a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport can also be reached in 10 minutes by car.

Serhs Carlit Boutique Hotel is located in Barcelona, 900 metres from the iconic Sagrada Família Basilica and Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms, all with free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV.

The Serhs Carlit is a 10-minute walk from Arc de Triomf, with Ciutadella Park and the trendy Born district just beyond. You can walk to the Agbar Tower in 15 minutes.

Tetuan Metro Station is just 200 metres away, just 1 stop away from Passeig de Gràcia. Estació del Nord Bus Station is 750 metres away.

The hotel has a café-bar serving a daily buffet breakfast, as well as snacks and drinks throughout the day. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona, as well as offering restaurant recommendations.

Offering a year-round outdoor pool with city views, Ohla Eixample is a stylish boutique hotel located 10 minutes’ walk from two of Gaudi’s major works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout and a Clef d’Or Concierge service.

Each well-designed room comes with a large bed and a private bathroom with bath or a rainfall shower. There is a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar with local delicatessen and a free safe for laptops. A turndown service is also available.

The on-site Michelin-starred Xerta Restaurant serves traditional recipes from the Ebro Region; and a complete breakfast is also served every morning including a huge selection of local products. The hotel also has the Lobby Bar, a meeting point for both locals and hotel guests; and the Sky Bar, a creative cocktail bar.

Guests can enjoy a selection of high-tech fitness equipment at the on-site gym; and beauty treatments and fashion services such as personal shopper are available on prior request.

Ohla Eixample is conveniently located in the Eixample District, in the modernist area locally known as Quadrat d’Or - Golden Square; within 5 minutes’ walk of the emblematic Diagonal Avenue, Rambla de Catalunya and Paseo de Gracia shopping boulevards. This urban building has an eye-catching ceramic façade, made from over 1000 carved pieces that represent Vivaldi’s Four Seasons.

Located just 50 metres from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available.

The hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 450 metres from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk away.

All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell.

A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar.

There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona is located in Eixample District, close to the Ramblas, the main shopping area and Barcelona’s main tourist attractions. It offers a Mayan-style luxury spa. A limousine service with a chauffeur is available on request.

Opened in 1919, this hotel features a neo-classical façade and stylish air-conditioned rooms with classic decor. Each room is spacious and comes with satellite TV, desk, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers.

There are 2 restaurants: L'Éclair, located at the hall, and the Winter Garden Restaurant, set at the Roof Terrace; guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the Bluesman Cocktail Bar.

Hotel El Palace Barcelona has a Mayan-style spa with a Temazcal Sauna. Other facilities at this hotel include both fitness and business center and an outdoor pool.

Third person sharing in room is available for Superior room, Junior Suite and Superior Suite.

Staff at Hotel El Palace Barcelona can provide information about the area. Passeig de Gràcia Metro and Railway Station as well as Urquinaona Metro station are less than 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are approximately 15 minutes’ walk away.

Catalonia Diagonal Centro is set in the heart of Barcelona’s Eixample district, 300 metres from Diagonal Metro Station. It features a seasonal outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.

At the Catalonia Diagonal Centro, you can enjoy modern, comfortable accommodation next to some of Barcelona’s most popular sights. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

Only 300 metres away on Passeig de Gràcia is La Pedrera, one of Gaudi’s famous creations. Take a stroll past the Modernista buildings to reach Plaça Catalunya and the lively Ramblas area.

Back at the hotel, relax in your stylish bedroom with contemporary wooden furniture and marble en suite bathroom. Watch satellite television or take advantage of the free wireless internet connection.

A short stroll from the hotel takes you to trendy Gràcia, with its bohemian shops and leafy squares, and a huge selection of bars and restaurants. Nearby metro and bus lines make it easy to see the whole of this cosmopolitan city.

Hotel_Name: Ofelias Hotel 4Sup by Bondia Hotel Group
Hotel_Description_Long:
Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool.

Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival.

The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away.

Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities .These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. .

The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access.

Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings.

Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro.

Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

This design hotel is in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, 250 metres from the Picasso Museum. It features a gym, 24-hour reception, and air-conditioned rooms with colourful LED lighting and flat-screen TVs.

Free coffee, tea and water are offered in a self-service area in the Chic & Basic Born. The hotel also has a lounge with free Wi-Fi and comfortable designer armchairs.

The Modernist-style building has high ceilings, large windows and marble staircases. It is within 100 metres of Ciudadela Park and Barcelona’s Chocolate Museum. La Rambla is a 10-minute walk away.

Rooms at the Chic & Basic Born Boutique Hotel feature a glass shower cubicle in the centre of the room. There is also a hairdryer, slippers and bathroom amenities.

Breakfast is served in the Chic & Basic's Moderna bar, where you can also enjoy a cocktail. It is open 7 days a week from 08:00 to 22:00

Hotel Cram Hotel is set in Barcelona’s central Eixample district, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It features a rooftop pool with city views and the Two Michelin Stars Angle Barcelona restaurant. All rooms have free WiFi and large flat-screen TVs.

The Cram Hotel Hotel is located in a building that dates back to 1892 and features a modernist façade, and a modern, elegant interior. Rooms boast advanced lighting and access control technology.

The air-conditioned rooms at Cram Hotel Hotel feature a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A bathrobe and slippers are available upon request. Rooms feature beds by Treca de Paris, and elegant curtains by Gastón y Daniela. Some rooms have a private balcony.

The Two Michelin Stars Restaurante Angle Barcelona offers modern dishes using fresh produce. Hotel Cram Hotel Barcelona also has a cocktail bar and poolside bar, and room service is available.

The hotel has a tour desk and 24-hour front desk. You can hire a bicycle or car.

Hotel Oasis is located just 250 metres from França Railway Station and 100 metres from Barcelona’s Born district. The modern, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and private bathrooms with hairdryer.

The hotel features a seasonal terrace with a seasonal outdoor pool. The hotel's Oasis café-bar offers a range of hot drinks and cocktails throughout the day.

The beach and bars of Barceloneta are just 200 metres away, while Santa Maria del Mar Church is 4 minutes’ walk away. Oasis is 50 metres from Barceloneta Metro Station, and 300 metres from Ciutadella Park.

Please be aware that the type of bed is always subject to availability.

Boasting 1950s décor, this modern hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen satellite TV. Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya is 8 minutes’ walk away.

The rooms at the Chic & Basic Velvet have parquet floors and smart décor. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the dining room; and guests can enjoy a drink at the honesty bar which has direct access to terrace.

There is a variety of restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk.

Chic & Basic Velvet is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Fira Convention Centre and the airport bus stop. Montjüic, with the Joan Miró Museum and Magic Fountain, is also a 10-minute walk away

Located next to Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia Boulevard, Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup offers an outdoor pool, a free gym, a terrace, free Wi-Fi and paid private parking.

All the rooms at Catalonia Passeig de Gràcia 4* Sup has a smart TV with Chromecast app.

The restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine with a selection of dishes from the "Gourmet Corner" menu. Gluten-free menus are available on request.

There is also a gastrobar and a bar with a cocktail menu. An electric vehicle charging station is available.

The property is 500 metres from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, 200 metres from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, 13-minute walk from La Pedrera and 7-minute walk from Palau de la Música Catalana. Airport buses can be reached within 350 metres.

Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 350 metres away.

Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain.

Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property.  An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday.

Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries ,and a hairdryer.

Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

Set on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue, the Hesperia Barcelona Presidente offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. There is a gym and a terrace offering city views.

This hotel has views of the city.

The Hesperia Barcelona Presidente is close to a shopping area, and the main sightseeing bus stops just 50 metres from the hotel. The popular Illa shopping centre is 15 minutes’ walk away.

Diagonal Metro Station is 10 minutes’ walk away, and offers a direct link to Plaza Catalunya. Gaudi’s La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig de Gracia can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

Set within the World Trade Center building, this 5-star design hotel overlooks Barcelona’s port and is a 5-minute walk from La Rambla. It features a seasonal rooftop pool, a gym and a spacious terrace.

The Eurostars Grand Marina Hotel GL offers modern rooms with wooden flooring and warm-coloured fabrics. A flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a spacious work desk are featured in each room. A pillow menu is also available.

The chic Grand Marina restaurant serves Mediterranean meals prepared with seasonal ingredients, while the lobby bar features exotic cocktails and live music. In the mornings, a rich breakfast is served on the terrace, weather permitting.

The Marina GL's gym offers cardiovascular equipment and free weights. Massage services are available.

Drassanes Metro Station, providing links to the rest of the city, is just 500 metres from the hotel while Barcelona Airport is 15 km away.

Hotel_Name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel
Hotel_Description_Long:
Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona’s Plaça Espanya.

The modern rooms at the Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. They are all soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs and air conditioning.

Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana, an IHG Hotel is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum and the Magic Fountain.

Espanya Metro Station is 150 metres from the hotel. The historic centre of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few stops away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel.

Breakfast is available at an additional cost.

Hotel_Name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
Hotel_Description_Long:
Located between the stylish Paseo de Gràcia and Rambla de Catalunya, Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton offers a private terrace with an outdoor pool. Plaza Catalunya is 7 minutes' walk away.

Rooms combine modern and vintage furniture and some feature traditional details like mosaic-tiled floors. They have flat-screen TVs, a minibar, hairdryer and free safe. The TVs have over 50, some international channels and free WiFi.

Solomillo Restaurant is a brasserie, offering guests the option of having meat by weight. The modern Charcuteria serves cheese plates, cold cuts and market products, as well as a variety of cocktails. You can also visit the Patio, Terrace & Pool.

There is a fitness room and guests can make use of the chromatic sauna for free. Massages are available on request for an extra cost.

Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s impressive Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Passeig de Gràcia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, with a direct route to the Barcelona Airport.

The Streets Apartments Rambla provides accommodation within less than 1 km of the centre of Barcelona, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a dishwasher, a microwave and a toaster. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. When staying at the apartment, guests can use private entrance.

At the apartment complex, all units have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units are air conditioned and include a seating and/or dining area. The units include a wardrobe.

Sightseeing tours are available near the property.

Popular points of interest near The Streets Apartments Rambla include Sant Sebastian Beach, Sant Miquel Beach and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Catalonia Roma is 600 metres from Sants AVE Train and Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi, and you can reach Barcelona city centre in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

There are direct train links to Barcelona Airport from Sants Station and the Airport Bus also stops outside it.

The modern, air-conditioned rooms have wooden floors, a mini fridge with complimentary water and satellite TV. There is a safe and minibar, and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel restaurant. Room service is available and there is also a bar.

Plaza Espanya, Montjuic’s Magic Fountain and the Fira Conference Centre are all within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel.

The 24-hour front desk at Catalonia Roma boasts a large stained-glass skylight. You can rent a car and currency exchange is offered.

Pets: Only one dog or cat less than 20 kg is allowed per room (on request). Supplement of 22€ night/animal and deposit of 200€.

Vincci Marítimo is located 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and the CCIB Convention Centre. It offers bright, stylish rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi throughout.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Marítimo feature modern décor, with parquet floors and relaxing images of the sea. They come with a pillow menu and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Rooms offer views of the charming Japanese Zen garden or Diagonal Mar Park.

The hotel’s Jardí de Mar Restaurant serves Mediterranean food using fresh ingredients. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The Ikebana Lounge Bar offers snacks, tapas and cocktails which can be enjoyed on the terrace.

The hotel’s reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Laundry and car rental services are also available from the front desk.

The Vincci Marítimo is just 500 metres from Mar Bella Beach. Selva de Mar Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel, connecting you with the city centre in 15 minutes.

Situated on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, this guest house is less than 200 metres from Liceu Metro Station. It offers simple, comfortable rooms and has free Wi-Fi access available throughout.

The Hostal Boquería’s functional rooms feature air conditioning and cable TV, as well as heating and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms with views of the Ramblas are subject to availability.

The Boquería has a 24-hour reception. Guests can also make use of its luggage storage.

The central location makes visiting Barcelona’s sights easy. The Boquería Market is just across the Ramblas. Barcelona Cathedral and the surrounding Gothic Quarter are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hostal Boqueria.

This design hotel is situated 15 minutes’ from the beach, in the 22@ business area of Barcelona’s Poble Nou district. Bogatell Metro Station, 350 metres away, connects with central Barcelona in 25 minutes.

The modern rooms at NH Barcelona Diagonal Center feature a flat-screen satellite TV, desk, minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The hotel serves a buffet breakfast.

You will find cafés and restaurants on Poblenou Rambla, 10 minutes’ walk away. Glòries Shopping Centre is also within a 10-minute walk.

This NH hotel features a 24-hour reception desk and a business centre. Rooms and facilities are adapted for disabled guests. There is free Wi-Fi throughout.

Barcelona Airport is about 18 km away, while CCIB Convention Centre is 3km away. Car rental is available at the hotel and private parking is available at an additional cost.

Catalonia Albeniz offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and satellite TV. It is situated 150 metres from Clot Train Station, and a 15-minute walk from Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia Church.

The property has a gym and an outdoor pool. You can also use the luggage storage facility on site at the Albeniz.

The varied buffet breakfast at the Catalonia Albeniz includes typical local dishes, such as potato omelette and bread with tomato.

The Albeniz offers bright, modern rooms with simple décor and wooden floors. Each room includes a minibar and a marble bathroom with a hair dryer, plus a safe. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

Catalonia Albeniz is just 700 metres from the shops and restaurants of Glòries Shopping Centre, while Encants Flea Market is a 5-minute walk away. Metro services and direct airport trains are available from nearby Clot Station.

Vincci Bit is located just 10 minutes walk from Mar Bella beach. Situated a 7-minute walk from El Maresme Forum Metro Station, it features a sauna, a gym and a rooftop swimming pool with city views.

The restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and à la carte meals, including gluten-free products. There is also a lounge, bar and room service available.

The air-conditioned rooms at Vincci Bit are bright and comfortable and feature a flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and a minibar. The private bathrooms include a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is also available.

There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops within a few minutes walk from the hotel. Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre is just 300 metres away.

The International Convention Centre (CCIB) is a 9-minute walk from Vincci Bit. The historic centre of Barcelona can be reached in just 15-minutes by metro or tram.

This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard.

There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station.

There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

Situated in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Hotel Catalonia Port has a modern gym and a sun terrace with a small seasonal outdoor pool. Each air-conditioned room has free WiFi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The hotel’s contemporary El Racó del Port restaurant opens from Monday to Saturday, serving seasonal Mediterranean cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast, available until 12:00 at the weekends, is offered in the dining room, and there is also a lobby bar.

The Catalonia Port Hotel offers stylish rooms with hardwood floors. They all include a safe, a minibar and a private bathroom.

Catalonia Port is just 250 metres from the bottom of the famous Las Ramblas, and Port Vell Harbour is 400 metres away. Drassanes Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away.

Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes.

The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo.

Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available.

You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

Featuring an impressive lobby, the stylish Hilton Barcelona offers free WiFi, access to its 24-hour gym and rooms with city views and plasma TV. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.

Each stylish, soundproofed room at the Barcelona Hilton features air conditioning, iPod docking stations and tea and coffee-making facilities.

Hotel Hilton Barcelona is just 100 metres from L’Illa Shopping Centre and 300 metres from María Cristina Metro Station. Plaça Catalunya and the historic city centre are 15 minutes away by Metro. You can drive to Sants Station in 5 minutes, and El Prat Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

Hilton Barcelona’s Mosaic restaurant offers Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine prepared using seasonal, local products. The Vibe Bar & Restaurant serves tapas and cocktails. Guests can enjoy live sport on the bar’s large TV.

Conveniently located less than 10 minutes’ walk from Hospital Clinic Metro Station, Hotel Viladomat by Silken is located in Barcelona. This property features free WiFi and an on-site bar.

Each room at this property is air conditioned and has satellite TV, safe, desk, and minibar. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries.

Hotel Viladomat by Silken has a 24-hour front desk and offers a ticket service. A shuttle to the airport is available for an extra charge, and there is luggage storage on site.

Plaza Catalunya and Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas are 20 minutes away by foot. The friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and its main points of interest. Sants Station is 1 km away from Hotel Viladomat by Silken, with direct links to Barcelona Airport.

This ultra-modern hotel is located right on central Barcelona’s Ramblas, just 300 metres from the seafront promenade. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The rooms at the Ikonik Ramblas feature parquet floors and chic décor. Each one comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. They can also help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events.

Many famous sites are within easy walking distance. The Liceu Theatre is 400 metres away, while Plaza Real is a 3-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral is less 800 metres away.

You can walk to Barcelona’s famous Boquería Market in 7 minutes from the hotel. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 15 minutes’ walk away.

Acta BCN 40 Hotel is centrally located 350 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Universitat, and a 5-minute walk from the Ramblas. It offers modern rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs.

Rooms at the Acta are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter, and have a free safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities, and you can request an iron at reception.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast in the hotel’s stylish breakfast room. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. There are many bars, shops and restaurants within a short walk of the hotel.

The Acta BCN 40 has a 24-hour front desk and offers luggage storage. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Hotel_Name: RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles
Hotel_Description_Long:
RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk.

 RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away.

Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the  RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles.

Acta Splendid is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas. It offers 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Staff at the Hotel Splendid’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is also a computer in the lobby that guests can use for free.

There is a public car park 450 metres from the hotel, around a 7-minute walk. You can walk to the Palau de la Música Catalana, a Modernist auditorium and UNESCO World Heritage Site, in 15 minutes.

Gluten-free breakfasts are available upon request.

This hotel is next to Diagonal Mar Shopping Centre and just 400 metres from Nova Mar Bella Beach. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with a LED TV.

Hilton Diagonal Mar Barcelona's terrace, Purobeach Barcelona, has an outdoor pool and paddling pool available from April to October. All services on the Purobeach terrace, including Balinese beds, sunbeds and massages are available for an extra charge.

Purobeach Restaurant offers a diverse menu, as well as a variety of classic cocktails and international spirits. Aürt Restaurant serves Catalan food cooked in front of you. Guests can also enjoy tapas, snacks or drinks at Ma'i.

The hotel has 22 meeting rooms. Barcelona’s CCIB Convention Centre is located next door to the hotel. El Maresme-Forum Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away, and from here you can get to central Barcelona in around 15 minutes. Barcelona's El Prat Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

Occidental Barcelona 1929 features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Occidental Barcelona 1929 all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.

A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always at hand to help.

Sants Railway Station is less than 1 km from Occidental Barcelona 1929, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

Pere IV is situated in the Poble Nou District, 10 minutes’ walk from the lively Port Olimpic area and Barcelona's beaches. This hotel features a free spa, free Wi-Fi and 24-hour reception.

Each of the spacious rooms comes with a minibar, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The à la carte Garum Restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. The hotel serves a daily, buffet breakfast.

Guests enjoy free access to the Pere IV's spa, which includes a Finnish sauna, a hammam, indoor pool and sensation showers.

The Pere IV is a short walk from the beach and the new marina. Nearby Bogatell Metro Station offers easy access to the beach and the city centre, which can both be reached within 15 minutes.

Hotel_Name: NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderon
Hotel_Description_Long:
The elegant NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón has an excellent location just off Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in central Barcelona. It has fitness centre and a year-round free rooftop pool with spectacular city views.

The air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Barcelona Gran Hotel Calderón feature free WiFi, a Nespresso machine and a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower and professional hairdryer.

Room service is also available 24 hours and the Eleven Bar serves cocktails and light snacks.

The breakfast buffet has a variety of high antioxidant dishes and a fresh juice corner. Breakfast can also be requested in your room, and a light early breakfast is available.

Staff in the Guest Relations department can help you throughout your stay and advise you on what to see and do in Barcelona.

The hotel is just one block away from Gaudí’s famous Casa Batlló. You can walk to the city’s Gothic Quarter in about 10 minutes.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique is set in an impressive historic building, next to Barcelona’s Universitat Metro Station. It offers free Wi-Fi and bright, air-conditioned rooms, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla.

Rooms feature wooden floors and have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique offers a buffet breakfast each morning. A gluten-free breakfast is available upon request. Due to its central location, there are many bars and restaurants within a short walk.

ITC Barcelona By Soho Boutique has a 24-hour front desk, and a public parking is available nearby for an additional charge. The Airport Bus stops opposite in Plaza Universitat.

Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel.

At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace.

Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

Set just off Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, 3 minutes’ walk from central Plaza Catalunya, Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup  features a seasonal outdoor pool with a south-facing terrace, a poolside snack bar and a chill-out area.

Housed in a modernist building, all bright and spacious rooms come with a flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast App, free WiFi and tea and coffee facilities. Some have a private terrace with a private pool. Room service is available.

The spa at Catalonia Ramblas 4* Sup features a relaxation area. It includes a sauna, a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage and beauty treatments are also available.

The hotel’s restaurant, Pelai Restaurant, offers Catalan market cuisine. Dishes cooked on a coal stove are available at the Pelai terrace, a rooftop terrace with a chill-out area with panoramic city views. A buffet breakfast is offered every morning and, on weekends, it is available until 11:00.

In the summer months, the terrace is open until 00:00 and has a summer menu, as well as cocktails and milkshakes.

The Atiram Oriente is located on Las Ramblas, between the Liceu Theatre and the Columbus Monument. Set in a 19th-century building, this hotel features a restaurant, terrace and free Wi-Fi.

All rooms have satellite TV and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Each has simple, contemporary décor with heating and air conditioning.

The hotel’s pretty restaurant serves buffet cuisine and a daily continental breakfast. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. The Atiram Oriente Barcelona also has a café on the Ramblas, close to many shops and restaurants.

The famous Boquería Market and Gothic Quarter are just a few minutes’ walk from the Hotel Atiram Oriente. Barcelona’s Port Vell is less than 500 metres away and Liceu Metro Station is 1 minute walk from the hotel.

Hotel_Name: AC Hotel Diagonal L'Illa by Marriott
Hotel_Description_Long:
AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa offers accommodation in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Camp Nou. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants,  paid parking located at commercial center.

Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.

Every room at this hotel has plush bedding, a flat-screen TV and a spacious work desk. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Surrounded by lush gardens, the property is near many upscale boutiques and restaurants.

The Suite Bar is a modern, welcoming space on the hotel’s second floor. Its contemporary décor and lighting make it an ideal spot to enjoy a drink.

The Picasso Museum is 3.8 km from AC Hotel Diagonal L´Illa, while La Pedrera is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is El Prat Airport, 11 km away.

Situated next to Gràcia FGC Train Station, Hotel Via Augusta has a rooftop terrace with views of Barcelona. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV.

The Via Augusta is a historic building with a beautiful original foyer. Rooms have simple, modern décor and wooden floors. They include a work desk, a safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer.

A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel, and drinks are available from the vending machine. A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in the popular Gràcia district, within a 5-minute walk.

Hotel Via Augusta is 400 metres from Fontana Metro Station, and Parc Güell is just 1 Metro stop away. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a 5-minute journey from nearby Gracia Station.

Hotel Transit is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants, the city’s main AVE Train Station. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

Rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, central heating and central air conditioning. Some rooms overlook an interior patio. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, shower, and hairdryer.

There are vending machines on-site for coffee, drinks and snacks. Several bars and restaurants can be found a short walk from the Transit Hotel.

You can reach Plaza Catalunya and La Rambla in 10 minutes by bus or Metro, and Sants Estació Metro Station is 250 metres away. Plaza Espanya and the Magic Fountain are 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

This design hotel offers free WiFi and is just 400 metres from Sagrada Família Church. Decorated in elegant neutral tones, rooms include a plasma screen TV with satellite channels.

Rooms at the Eurostars Monumental have wooden floors and modern lighting. Toiletries and a hairdryer are included in the stylish marble bathrooms.

A breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. You can also find various restaurants and cafés within a 5-minute walk, in the area around the Sagrada Familia.

Eurostars Monumental is 100 metres from Monumental Metro Station, which provides direct trains to Passeig de Gracia Station. Estació del Nord Bus Station is just 850 metres away. The property offers a parking space for luggage drop off in front of the hotel.

Hostal Lausanne is on Barcelona’s popular shopping street, Portal de l’Angel. It is a 2-minute walk from the Rambla and Plaza Catalunya Metro Station, and offers a free Wi-Fi zone.

Rooms at the Hostal Lausanne are simple and functional. There is a choice between rooms with a private or shared bathroom, and some have a sink.

The sightseeing bus stops in nearby Plaza Catalunya. The Gothic Quarter and Paseo de Gracia Avenue are within a 5-minute walk.

Bicycle and car rental are available, and the Lausanne has a 24-hour front desk.

Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away.

Hotel_Name: Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group
Hotel_Description_Long:
The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is located in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaça de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel features free Wi-Fi access.

Rooms at the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group feature contemporary décor and balconies or windows, while some also have large private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.

Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet-style restaurant. Guests can make use of the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group’s library, lounge and tour desk.

The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is under 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station and is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. El Prat Airport can be reached in 30 minutes, by bus.

Centrally located on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, this aparthotel offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

Located right opposite Barcelona Cathedral, this grand, neoclassic hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. It offers free WiFi, and some rooms have excellent views of the cathedral façade.

The stylish air-conditioned rooms at the Colón Hotel Barcelona have satellite TV and a minibar. There is a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer. Superior rooms also have a Nespresso coffee machine.

The hotel boasts an outdoor terrace café in the square, facing the cathedral. The hotel’s elegant restaurant serves Catalan cuisine and international dishes, and room service is available.

Guests can also enjoy the roof-top terrace with views of the cathedral

There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

Just a minute’s walk from Las Ramblas, this charming hotel offers a free Wi-Fi zone and a bright central courtyard filled with plants. Liceu Metro Station is only 200 metres away.
