AC Hotel Barcelona Forum is 500 metres from Maresme Metro Station. From here you can reach Passeig de Gràcia in central Barcelona in 15 minutes. Barcelona Airport is 19 km away.

Hostalin Barcelona is located in Barcelona, 200 metres from La Pedrera, on Barcelona's famous Passeig de Gràcia Avenue. The property offers 24-hour reception and free WiFi. Rooms are soundproofed, air conditioned and heated.

All rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV. . There is also a minibar, kettle and wardrobe. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a typical Barcelona covered balcony.

At Hostalin Barcelona Passeig de Gràcia you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a ticket service, a tour desk and luggage storage.

Hotel_Name: Claris Hotel & Spa GL, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Hotel_Description_Long:
Located just off Barcelona’s prestigious Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, this luxury hotel offers city views from its rooftop pool. It also has a unique art collection.

Built in a converted 19th century palace, Claris Hotel & Spa GL combines the classicism of the original place with modern materials and it has over 400 original pieces of art on display, giving it the Specialit Monument status. It offers free entry to the Barcelona Egyptian Museum, located next door.

The smart, soundproofed bedrooms feature stylish décor and hand-made furniture. Each one comes with LCD satellite TV, sofa and pieces of Roman, Egyptian and Hindu artwork.

The hotel’s Terraza del Claris Restaurant serves gourmet Mediterranean food on the roof terrace overlooking the characteristic rooftops of the Eixample quarter. The Os-kuro Sushi & Robata Restaurant offers classic recipes from Japanese gastronomy combined with Mediterranean ingredients and local produce.

All TV in rooms feature ChromeCast offering connectivity to platforms such as Netflix, Amazon Prime, Youtube, etc.

The Claris is just 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. The Ramblas is around 10 minutes’ walk away.

Granvia is set in an impressive 19th-century building, 100 metres from the shops and restaurants of Passeig de Gràcia. This luxurious hotel has free WiFi and a terrace.

Each stylish room has high ceilings, satellite TV and air conditioning. The private bathrooms include a bath tub or shower and hairdryer.

A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can enjoy a drink on the attractive terrace at the back of the hotel.

Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are less than 500 metres from the hotel. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are a 10-minute walk away.

The stylish Hotel Jazz is located 2 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya in the centre of Barcelona. It features a rooftop pool and terrace with views over the city.

The contemporary rooms include free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities.

A breakfast buffet is served in the modern bar-café area of Hotel Jazz. This includes fresh fruit, pastries, and baked goods.

Universitat Metro Station is less than 100 metres from the hotel. The MACBA and CCCB galleries are within a 5-minute walk while the Gothic Quarter is 10 minutes away.

In a prime location in the centre of Barcelona, Exe Plaza Catalunya provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.7 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. All units include a safety deposit box.

A buffet, continental or gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the property.

Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Exe Plaza Catalunya include Plaça Catalunya, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

Hotel Lloret Ramblas is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, just outside Plaza Catalunya Square. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi.

Each functional room at the Lloret Ramblas Hotel features a work desk and a private bathroom with amenities. Some rooms also have a private balcony.

Breakfast is served in Hotel Lloret Ramblas’s beautiful lounge-dining room, which dates from the early 20th century. The reception area has a free PC with internet and a free safe.

Barcelona Cathedral and the MACBA Modern Art Museum are both around 500 metres from Hotel Lloret. Catalunya Metro Station is a 1-minute walk away, and direct airport buses stop within 100 metres.

Hotel_Name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
Hotel_Description_Long:
Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is situated 350 metres from Glòries Shopping Centre, in the modern 22@ district of Barcelona. It offers an elegant restaurant and soundproofed rooms with free Wi-Fi and TV.

Rooms at the Four Points Barcelona Diagonal are bright and spacious, with wooden flooring. Each room has a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Rooms on higher floors offer great views, some of the Sagrada Familia.

La Avenida Restaurant serves traditional Spanish cuisine. A varied buffet breakfast is offered daily, and free coffee is available from 05:00 until 07:00. Taste local crafted beers, snacks and enjoy the best sports projections at 4Taps Bar.

The Four Points Diagonal is 600 metres from the colourful Agbar Tower, designed by Jean Nouvel. There are many bars and restaurants on nearby Rambla del Poblenou, and Bogatell Beach is within a 15-minute walk. Poblenou Metro Station is only 500 metres away.

Featuring a charming garden terrace, Praktik Garden is located 400 metres from Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gracia Boulevard. Fully reburbished in 2015, its chic rooms feature colourful mosaic floors, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi.

Girona Metro Station is just around the corner from the hotel. From there guests can reach the city’s Barceloneta Beach in 15 minutes. Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

All rooms at the Praktik Garden are equipped with air conditioning and some rooms have balconies. The modern bathroom includes a shower.

Guests can relax in the hotel lounge or on the furnished garden terrace. The hotel provides vending machines for drinks 24-hours a day.

Attractively located in Barcelona, Hotel Casa Sagnier features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel, the rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options.

Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff are willing to help at any time of the day at the reception.

Popular points of interest near Hotel Casa Sagnier include La Pedrera, Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV.

Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries.

Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel.

Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

The chic H10 Casanova Hotel is centrally located on Barcelona’s Gran Via, a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla. There is a garden spa with whirlpool and steam room.

Featuring contemporary boutique-style décor, the H10 Casanova offers air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. There is a minibar and safe, and the modern private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Room service is also available.

The on-site Despacio Spa Centre has a Vichy shower, a  steam bath and hot tub; massages as well as facial and body treatments are available on prior request according to the price list.

The hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a trendy café-bar. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk.

Urgell and Universitat Metro Stations are 300 metres away. You can walk to Paseo de Gracia’s designer shops in 10 minutes.

Featuring a quality bakery within the hotel, Praktik Bakery hotel is located in Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Diagonal Metro. Free Wi-Fi is available.

This modern hotel offers air-conditioned double/twin rooms including a flat-screen TV and private bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided free.

Guests can enjoy breakfast in the hotel and try the breads and pastries from the hotel's traditional bakery. Other services include provision of beach towels, ticket service for tourist bus, laundry, and airport transfers.

Praktik Bakery hotel is within a short walk of many bars, restaurants and shops. Paseo De Gracia Avenue and Gaudi's La Pedrera are just 250 metres away, and La Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. Plaza Catalunya Sqaure and Las Ramblas Boulevard is 1.3 km from the hotel.

Ideally located in the Ciutat Vella district of Barcelona, Som Nit Port Vell is set 1.3 km from Barceloneta Beach, 2.9 km from Nova Icaria Beach and 3 km from Mar Bella Beach. Among the facilities at this property are full-day security and a housekeeping service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.2 km from the city centre and 1.2 km from Sant Miquel Beach.

The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At the guest house, all units are soundproof. At the guest house, units come with bed linen and towels.

Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach of the property. A bicycle rental service is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Som Nit Port Vell include Santa Maria del Mar, Picasso Museum and Cathedral of Barcelona. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Featuring free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, Som Nit Born is located in the Born district of Barcelona. Just 10 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach, the guest house is also 500 metres away from the Picasso Museum.

The soundproofed rooms at Som Nit Born come with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom including a shower. There is a free luggage storage service and a safety deposit box is also available.

A wide range of bars and restaurants can be found in a 1-minute walk through the Born district.

This 19th-century Neoclassical building was chosen to feature in the first ever photograph taken in Spain. Picasso also lived here.

La Rambla Street, Port Vell Harbor and Barrio Gotico District can be reached within 10 minutes’ walk as Som Nit is located in the heart of Barcelona. You can catch the Sightseeing Bus 200 metres from the guest house and Barceloneta Metro Station is 2 minutes’ walk away.

This spacious and modern hotel is located in Eixample district, built in 2004, the Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Gran Via, features wide-open public spaces covered in marble.

Rooms include flat-screen TV, Wifi, safebox, desk, minibar, private bathrooms with toiletries.

A good location for tourism, you can easily walk to the Gothic Quarter and Ramblas, or up to the attractions of Montjuic. The city’s major business districts are also nearby.

Rooms include satellite TV, free Wi-Fi access, air conditioning and a bathroom with free toiletries.

Parking is available on site at an additional cost.

Located in Barcelona’s beachfront area of Barceloneta, this design hotel has a stylish terrace overlooking the port. It offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with a smart TV.

The rooms at the Hotel 54 Barceloneta feature modern décor and innovative lighting. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

There is a variety of good seafood restaurants within 5 minutes’ walk of Hotel 54.

The 54 Barceloneta is just 3 minutes’ walk from Barceloneta Beach. You can walk to the attractive Born district in 10 minutes, and Barceloneta Metro Station is a 7-minute walk away.

Located in Barcelona’s trendy Born district, Park Hotel offers stylish accommodation just 10 minutes' walk from Barceloneta Beach, opposite to Estació de França Station. Reception is open 24 hours a day. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property.

The air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Park feature modern décor in warm tones. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV, and soundproofing.

A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s bright café; and a wide variety of tapas are served at the on-site Ten's Tapas Restaurant, from the awarded-winning chef Jordi Cruz.

Park Hotel is just 200 metres from Mercat del Born public market and from Ciudadela Park, where you can find Barcelona Zoo.

Barceloneta Metro Station, located 300 metres from the hotel, connects you with the city centre in just 5 minutes.

Hotel_Name: Hotel Bagués, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
Hotel_Description_Long:
A rooftop pool and bar with fantastic city views are offered at this 5-star boutique hotel, situated on Las Ramblas. Each stylish room displays a unique item of jewellery from the Masriera Museum.

Hotel Bagués is set in the restored El Regulador Palace, once a jewellery workshop, and it is built in a romantic, classical style, which gives it the Speciality Monument status. It still houses the Masriera Jewellery Museum.

Rooms are decorated in deep colours, with ebony furniture and details in gold leaf. An iPod dock, flat-screen satellite TV and free soft drinks minibar are included. Many rooms also have views of La Rambla.

Situated in the Gothic Quarter, Hotel Bagués is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. Just 300 metres away, Plaza Catalunya Square offers excellent bus and Metro links.

Modern fusion cuisine is served in El Regulador Bistro. This includes creative versions of typical Catalan dishes. Room service is available 24 hours a day.

Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region with Casa Batllo and Passeig de Gracia nearby, H Regas Adults Only offers accommodation with access to a hot tub. Featuring free private parking, the 2-star guest house is 1 km from La Pedrera. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests.

All units feature air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a bath and slippers, units at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At the guest house, every unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the guest house, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 14 km from H Regas Adults Only.

These modern décor apartments are located next to Guinardó Park and 20 minutes’ walk from Gaudi’s famous Park Güell. Barcelona’s old town can be reached in less than 10 minutes by public transport.

Gaudint Barcelona Suites features one double bedroom apartments, all of them equipped with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi.

These stylish apartments feature a comfortable seating area with flat-screen TV. The kitchenette comes with microwave, gas hob, washing machine and dishwasher. Some apartments have a hot tub and others include a small private indoor pool.

Gaudint Barcelona Suites is well-connected to the city centre by public transport. The nearest metro station, Guinardó I Hospital de Sant Pau, is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

Guests will also find supermarkets, bars and restaurants nearby.

This central guest house is on Barcelona’s Las Ramblas, beside Liceu Metro Station, and 50 metres from La Boqueria Market. It offers air-conditioned rooms, with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs.

Public parking is available near the Hostal Las Flores Ramblas, but the great location means the city’s main tourist sites can be visited on foot.

Barcelona Cathedral is a 5-minute walk away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro or bus.

Las Flores has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you to make the most of central Barcelona’s lively night life. There is also a tour desk, and luggage storage is possible.

These Modernist apartments enjoy a very central location on Barcelona’s famous Ramblas, within 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Reial. They have full kitchens and free high-speed WiFi.

Ramblas Apartments all have air conditioning and a lounge and either 1 or 2 bedrooms. They have a bathroom and a kitchen with a hob, fridge and microwave.

The apartments are close to the Gothic Quarter, where you will find plenty of restaurants and tapas bars. You are also within a short walk of many of Barcelona’s main shopping areas, as well as the port. The nearest Metro station is Drassanes, about 5 minutes away.

Free Wi-Fi and a TV are included in Hostalet de Barcelona’s bright, functional rooms. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 300 metres away.

The Hostalet is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. This famous street is home to the Gaudi buildings, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló.

Hospital Clinic Metro Station offers direct trains to Sagrada Familia and Camp Nou Football Stadium. Provença Station is 800 metres away, and provides easy access to Plaza Catalunya Square.

Each simple, stylish room at the Hostalet has a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony, with views of the street or central patio. Guests receive a welcome gift of bottled water and a packet of biscuits.

Residencia Campus del Mar has an excellent location in Barcelona's Barceloneta neighbourhood, 200 metres from the beach. It features a fitness centre and free internet in rooms and public areas.

Each room at Residencia Campus del Mar has a kitchen area with a microwave and tea/coffee facilities. Most also have a TV.

Guests can make use of the library area and games room with snooker and table tennis at the Residencia. Private parking, a laundrette and 24-hour reception are available on site. Bicycles are available to rent, upon prior request.

There is also a range of vending machines.

Ciutadella Park and the Paseo Marítimo are within a 2-minute walk of Residencia Campus del Mar. Barceloneta Metro Station is 250 metres away.

The residence is open to the university community, including students, professors, researchers and administrative staff all year round.

Featuring free WiFi, Blue Barcelona is located in the Gracia district of Barcelona. Set next to Gracia FGC Station, this bed and breakfast offers a shared lounge and tour desk.

Each air-conditioned room at the property has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, desk, and hardwood floors. Some rooms have a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries, and others have access to shared bathroom facilities.

You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of Blue Barcelona. There are vending machines available.

Fontana Metro Station is 300 metres from the property, Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas Boulevard are 2 metro stops away, and Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia is 2.3 km from the property.

The Aparthotel Senator Barcelona is situated on Via Augusta, in a pleasant residential area, a 2-minute walk from Muntaner Train Station. It includes air conditioning, heating, and free Wi-Fi in hotel rooms.

All rooms and apartments have a TV, telephone, and a private bathroom with a bathtub or a shower. The apartments also include an equipped with kitchenette.

A 6-minute train ride will take you to Plaza Cataluña and Barcelona city centre. Sagrada Familia Cathedral is 3.3 km away.

Hotel Medicis is 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, allowing you to reach central Barcelona in around 10 minutes. There is Wi-Fi access and a rooftop sun terrace.

The Medicis Hotel is chic and functional, and offers reasonably priced accommodation in a good location. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer.

Just next to the hotel is one of Barcelona’s emblematic Art Nouveau buildings, the Sant Pau Hospital, designed by Domènech i Montaner. From here it is a 10-minute walk down Avinguda de Gaudí to The Sagrada Família. You can stop for a coffee, or a meal, in one of the many café-restaurants that line this avenue.

The hotel has a tour desk, and you can hire a bicycle or car. There is a 24-hour front desk.

Offering a central location, Barcelona Century Hotel is located in the Eixample district, just a short walk from the Ramblas and Passeig de Gracia. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel are soundproofed and come with satellite TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with hairdryer.

The hotel offers buffet breakfast as well as a bar. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tourist information about the area.

Barcelona’s main shopping district can be reach within walking distance of the hotel. You can visit Barcelona’s Cathedral or the Gothic Quarter.

Urgell, Hospital Clínic or Universitat Metro Stations are less than 7 minutes’ walk of Barcelona Century Hotel.

Featuring free WiFi and air conditioning, Apartamentos DV is located in Barcelona, 800 metres from Camp Nou. Palau Sant Jordi is 2.8 km from the property. Free private parking is available on site.

Offering views over a patio, each apartment comes with a flat-screen TV and a fully equipped kitchen including a microwave, kettle and kitchenware. Apartments come with a bathroom with a double ended bath and hairdryer is available on prior request. Apartments are cleaned every day and bed linen and towels are provided. Superior apartments have a spa bath.

Plenty of restaurants, bars and shops are within 5 minutes' walk.

Montjuïc is 2.9 km from Apartamentos DV, while Casa Batllo is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 9 km from the property.

This modern, eco-friendly hostel offers a terrace with city views and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is set 10 minutes’ walk from Nova Icaría Beach and the Olympic Port.

Rooms at Twentytu Hostel Barcelona are shared or private with a maximum of 4 beds and an en-suite bathroom. All include individual lockers and sheets. Towels can be rented at reception.

There is a communal kitchen, a chill-out lounge and dining areas. Various bars and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk and Razzmatazz nightclub is 200 metres away.

The property organises events, guided tours and activities and bike rental is available. Ciutadella Park is 10 minutes’ walk away and L’Auditori Theatre and Catalan National Theatre are 5 minutes’ walk away.

Twentytu Hostel Barcelona is 5 minutes’ walk from Marina Metro Station, 3 stops from Plaza Catalunya. Nord Bus Station is 10 minutes’ walk away.

For reservations of more than three nights or more than 7 people, special charges will apply, for this the hotel will contact you personally

Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere.

Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find a hairdryer and toiletries.

The surroundings are full of bars, restaurants and shops, like the F.C. Barcelona Museum. Las Glorias Shopping Centre is a 10-minute walk away. Gaudí’s Pedrera and Casa Batlló are 10 minutes' walk away. Sagrada Familia Metro Station, located 2 minutes' walk away, connects you with the city centre in 7 minutes, offering easy access to Plaza Catalunya, the Ramblas and the beach.

You can buy discounted tickets for the tourist bus, which stops 100 metres from the hotel.

The buffet breakfast with homemade pastries, local products and freshly squeezed natural orange juice is served daily in our café from 08:00 to 10:30.

Urbany Hostel Barcelona is on Barcelona’s Meridiana Avenue, 300 metres from Clot Metro Station. This large, funky hostel has spacious common areas where you can relax and meet people from abroad. There are free Wi-Fi throughout and rooftop terrace with city views and bar service.

Each modern dormitory or room features lockers, an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning.

The Urbany Barcelona serves a daily continental buffet breakfast. It has a kitchen with cookers, fridges and microwaves. There is a café-bar and vending machines, and you can request a packed lunch.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. Free city maps and tour information are available.

Urbany Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from Glories Shopping Centre, and Gaudí’s Sagrada Familia is a 15-minute walk away. You can reach the city centre in 15 minutes by Metro or bus, and the beach is 2 km away.

Offering a 1960’s vibe and rooms with vintage décor, this hotel is set in the heart of Barcelona, only 2 minutes’ walk from the famous Ramblas.  Free Wi-Fi is available throughout.

Each air-conditioned room at Sixties Ramblas features a TV and a private bathroom. Most rooms have a balcony.

Sixties Ramblas has a bar and a restaurant. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide tourist information about the area. Bike rental services are also available, and there is also a stylish white billiards table.

The nearest Metro Station is Drassanes, only 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can also walk to the harbour or Plaza Catalunya Square in less than 10 minutes.

Sixties Ramblas is close to the Born district, with numerous trendy bars and restaurants serving local and international food.

Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The property is 10 minutes’ walk from both La Pedrera and fashionable Passeig the Gracia.

Featuring an elegant décor, rooms at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique have a flat-screen TV, free safe and a wardrobe. The private bathroom comes with shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony with street views.

A breakfast is served every morning at Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique. Several restaurant, traditional tapas bars and shops can be found in the surrounding area. Some of the trendiest bars are in Gracia District, 500 metres away.

Umma Barcelona B&B Boutique is in the Eixample District of Barcelona. You can walk to Gaudi’s Casa Batlló in 15 minutes. The closest metro station is Diagonal Metro Station, just 400 metres away. Trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from a train station located 1 km away.

Aparthotel Napols is centrally located, 350 metres from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station. Air-conditioned rooms feature a well-equipped kitchen, and a living room with sofa and TV.

Estació de Nord Bus Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and has direct connections to Girona Airport. You can walk to Plaza Catalunya and the Rambla in 15 minutes. There is free WiFi in the apartments.

Soundproofed rooms at the Napols have a safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with amenities.

The modern kitchen has a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a dishwasher and dining area.

The complex has a 24-hour reception and a shared terrace. You can hire a car, and Napols offers a laundry service and luggage storage.

Attractively set in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona, HOSTAL BEDMATES is situated 2.9 km from Sant Miquel Beach, 2.9 km from Somorrostro Beach and 2.9 km from Barceloneta Beach. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at HOSTAL BEDMATES have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels.

HOSTAL BEDMATES offers a buffet or continental breakfast.

Popular points of interest near the hotel include Magic Fountain of Montjuic, Santa Maria del Mar and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from HOSTAL BEDMATES.

Hostal Live Barcelona is located on central Barcelona's Gran Vía Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas, Plaza Catalunya Square and Plaza España Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

Rooms are modern and spacious, featuring 32-inch LED TVs. Some rooms have a private terrace overlooking a courtyard, or a balcony with views of Gran Vía Avenue. Use of a microwave, fridge and ironing facilities can be requested at the reception.

Guests can find a wide selection of bars and restaurants in the area, including a restaurant located 20 metres away, where guests receive discounts on breakfast, lunch and dinner.

In 15 minutes you can walk to Plaza Espanya, where the Fira Exhibition Centre and Las Arenas Shopping Centre are. It is also 2 stops away on the metro.

The nearest metro station is Urgell, just 100 metres away. Airport buses leave from a stop located 350 metres away.

Free Wi-Fi and functional, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV are offered at HOTEL FORNOS - Barcelona. It is situated on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to Plaça Reial Square.

The Fornos Hotel is located on the edge of the Gothic District, 500 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. Liceu Metro Station and the colourful Boquería Food Market are a 3-minute walk away.

The hotel’s bright rooms have simple, modern décor and tiled floors. Each room has a private bathroom and a safe. Many rooms also have a small balcony with views of the Ramblas or Plaza Real.

A light continental breakfast is offered at the hotel. Drinks and snacks are also available from the vending machines. The 24-hour reception offers information about Barcelona. Public parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

Hotel Call Barcelona is located right in the centre of Barcelona’s historic Barri Gótic, 10 minutes' walk from Las Ramblas. It is close to Plaça Sant Jaume and not far from the Cathedral.

The rooms in the Hotel Call are spacious and practical. It offers air conditioned or heated accommodation, depending on the season. There is free Wi-Fi and a safe. The bathrooms have a shower.

The nearest Metro stops are Jaume I and Liceu, both about 10 minutes’ away. The famous Ramblas are also about 10 minutes’ walk away.

Hotel Call is also close to central Barcelona’s main shopping areas such as Portaferrisa and Portal de L'Àngel. The trendy Born area is also close by – here you will find plenty of restaurants and bars.

Just 350 metres from Mar Bella Beach, Eurohotel Diagonal Port offers Mediterranean Sea views from its setting in Barcelona’s Poble Nou district.

Rooms at this hotel are spacious and feature contemporary design. All come with air conditioning, satellite TV. Free wired internet access is also available.

Facilities at Eurohotel Diagonal Port include a continental breakfast.

Eurohotel Diagonal Port is located 7 minutes’ walk from Poblenou Metro Station, which is just 5 stops from central Barcelona. The hotel is just over 2 km from Ciutadella Park and the Forum venue is a 20-minute walk away.

The hotel offers easy access to the 22@ financial district, close to Barcelona International Convention Centre and shops. There is a Metro station and buses stop within 5 minutes' walk of the hotel.

Barcelona Travel is located in a Modernist building from the XIX century in the centre of Barcelona, a little over 5 minutes' walk from Gran Vía Avenue and Plaça Universitat Square. Free WiFi access is available.

Each modern, air-conditioned room features parquet floors and a 40-inch flat-screen TV. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathrooms also come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Bed linen and towels are provided.

Tourist information can be provided at the reception, and bikes and car rental are also available. Transportation to Barcelona El Prat Airport, located 20 minutes away by car, can be arranged.

The guest house is 850 metres from Passeig de Gracia Station, and Plaça Catalunya is 10 minutes away on foot.

Set on Parallel Avenue, Hotel Auto Hogar is just opposite Parallel Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from the Ramblas. It offers air-conditioned rooms with private bathrooms.

All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and vanity mirror.

Some of Barcelona’s most popular theatres can be found within 5 minutes’ walk, while Montjuïc hill is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel. The Fira Exhibition Centre is just over 1 km away.

The Auto Hogar Hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean dishes, and is open 7 days a week. The hotel also has a café.

The hotel reception offers free newspapers, and can arrange bicycle and car hire.

This classically decorated guest house is set in the late 19th-century modernist district of Eixample, in the centre of Barcelona. There is free WiFi available throughout.

All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

Hotel_Description_Long:
Eric Vökel Gran Via Suites are boutique apartments set in central Barcelona, 10 minutes’ walk from Plaza de Espanya Square. These chic apartments offer free WiFi access.

Each air-conditioned apartment at Eric Vökel has attractive, contemporary décor. All accommodation has a well-equipped kitchenette and a spacious living area with a flat-screen TV.

There are several bars and cafés within 100 metres of the Suites. Set on Gran Via Avenue, the apartments have easy access to a range of supermarkets and shops.

The Vökel is just 20 minutes’ walk from Montjuïc Mountain and Catalunya’s National Art Museum. The famous Las Ramblas and the surrounding Gothic Quarter can be reached in 10 minutes, by Metro.

Located in Barcelona, 3.7 km from Sagrada Familia, Laramond Barcelona Rooms provides air-conditioned rooms. Located around 4.2 km from Park Güell, the guest house with free WiFi is also 5 km away from La Pedrera. The guest house features family rooms.

At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. At Laramond Barcelona Rooms every room has a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

Passeig de Gracia is 5 km from the accommodation, while Casa Batllo is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 20 km from Laramond Barcelona Rooms.

Located in central Barcelona, Hostal Balkonis guest house offers a terrace, free Wi-Fi throughout. Sant Antoni Metro Station is just 80 metres away.

This property offers functional and modern rooms with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries each. They all feature heating, air conditioning, flat-screen TV and a radio. Some have a balcony with garden and city views.

You can hire bicycles on site, allowing you to explore more of the city.

You will find bars and restaurants in the surrounding streets and the closest supermarket is just 30 metres away.

A 12-minute walk will take you to Barcelona’s La Rambla and Barceloneta Beach is 3 km away. Plaza de España, with direct buses to Barcelona Airport is 20 minutes’ walk from Hostal Balkonis.

Set in the heart of Barcelona, just 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya Square, TOC Hostel Barcelona offers an outdoor pool and a terrace.

The property offers private and shared rooms with air conditioning and heating. Some rooms have a flat-screen TV and some have a private bathroom. There is a shared TV area, kitchen and games room for guests to make use of.

TOC Hostel Barcelona also offers tourist information of the area and a ticket service. You will also find many bars, restaurants and supermarkets in the surrounding streets.

Metro Universtitat is a 2-minute walk from the property and a 25-minute metro ride will take you to Barceloneta Beach. Sagrada Familia is 10 minutes’ metro ride away.

Featuring free Wi-Fi, Apart Easy Gracia is located in Barcelona’s Gracia District, within 400 metres of Passeig de Gracia and Gaudí’s La Pedrera building. The property offers modern apartments with air conditioning.

Each apartment features wooden floors and has a living room with a sofa and TV. An oven, microwave and washing machine are included in the kitchenette. The bathroom comes with a shower.

Some apartments offer a private terrace with city views. A large variety of supermarkets, bars and restaurants can be found within 5 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

Plaça Catalunya and the famous Sagrada Familia can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Diagonal Metro Station, with connection to the historic centre, is 400 metres away.

Hotel Del Comte is 100 metres from Barcelona's Urgell Metro Station and 15 minutes walk from the Rambla and Plaza Espanya. It offers modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.

The air-conditioned rooms at Del Comte feature parquet floors and smart design. Each one comes with a work desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Staff at the Del Comte Hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona.

There is a bus stop just 3 minutes’ walk from the Del Comte which provides transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport. It is only 2 stops on the Metro to Plaza Catalunya, Barcelona’s main square.

Spot Smart Nomad is located in central Barcelona, 450 metres from Plaza Espanya and 100 metres from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers spacious and modern apartments with a private patio.

Located in Plaza Espanya is Las Arenas Shopping Centre, a converted bullring. You can also find the Magic Fountain at Montjüic, the Joan Miró Foundation and the National Museum of Catalunya. Many restaurants, bars and shops can be found in the surrounding streets.

Spot Smart Nomad feature stylish, white décor. Each unit has a separate lounge area with a flat-screen TV. All suites are equipped with a safe, fridge and tea and coffee-making facilities.

The property serves a daily breakfast on request which includes fresh fruit. There is a bright lounge with sofas where you can relax.

Spot Smart Nomad is 1 minute’s walk from Rocafort Metro Station, taking you to Plaza Catalunya in less than 5 minutes. From there you can walk to Gaudí's Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within 10 minutes. Airport buses leave from Plaza Espanya, and you can walk to Sants Train Station in 15 minutes.

Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday.

Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box.

Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms.

On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas.
 The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time.

The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

This stylish hotel has an excellent central location, 50 metres from Barcelona’s Las Ramblas and just 100 metres from Plaza Catalunya. It offers a rooftop pool, sauna and free Wi-Fi.

Rooms at the Silken Ramblas are stylish, and are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. There is central heating and air conditioning according to the season. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer.

The Silken has a restaurant and bar. Room service is available. There is a also a pleasant terrace.

The Silken has a tour desk and the sightseeing bus stops nearby in Plaza Catalunya.

Sant Jordi Hostels Sagrada Familia is located just moments from Gaudi’s Sagrada Familia Church. It offers dorm rooms, private rooms and apartment-style accommodation. Free WiFi access in available most areas.

Featuring skateboard-themed décor and an indoor mini-ramp, the hostel offers a shared guest kitchen and lounge, as well as a stylish lobby with computer facilities.

All dormitory rooms and triple rooms are located in the hostel area, and have heating, air-conditioning and individual lockers and shelves with a reading light and plug.

All private double and single rooms are located upstairs from the hostel in the apartment-style area, and include air conditioner. Guests in this area have use of a shared kitchen and living room.

Sant Jordi Hostel is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Sant Pau Metro Station, giving easy access to all parts of the city.

Hotel Vilamarí is set 250 metres from Plaza de Espanya Metro Station and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. This hotel features a terrace and a small gym with Turkish Bath.

The Vilamarí’s rooms have simple, elegant décor and dark wood furniture. Each room includes flat-screen satellite TV. The stylish bathrooms come with amenities and a hairdryer. The hotel features centrally controlled air conditioned or heating depending on the season.

Barcelona’s MNAC Art Museum and the Magic Fountains are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. Las Arenas Shopping Centre is just 200 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 15-minute metro ride away and Barcelona Beach can be reached in 35 minutes.

Set in the Gothic Quarter and next to Urquinaona Metro Station, HCC Montblanc offers  air-conditioned rooms, free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a minibar.

Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and à la carte Mediterranean cuisine in El Racó del Montblanc restaurant.

Close to the Born district, Hotel Montblanc Barcelona is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and 500 metres from Plaza de Catalunya. Palau de la Musica Concert Hall, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is just 250 metres away.

City tour buses and direct buses to Barcelona Airport stop at Plaza Catalunya.

This modern hotel is centrally located 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Urquinaona Metro Station and 400 metres from the Palau de la Musica. It offers 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi.

The air-conditioned rooms at Musik Boutique Hotel feature an iPod docking station, flat-screen satellite TV and a safe. They are sound-proofed and have a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony.

Breakfast is available and you will find many shops, bars and restaurants within a short walk. The Ramblas is a 10-minute walk away and you can reach Barceloneta Beach in 10 minutes by bus or metro.

Located just 8 minutes’ walk from central Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya, Hotel HCC Taber is housed in an impressive Modernist building. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.

The rooms at HCC Taber feature satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.

The building of the HCC Taber was originally designed by the famous Barcelona architect, Domènech i Montaner, who also designed the amazing Palau de la Música Catalana. It still retains its characteristic wrought-iron balconies and large bay windows.

The hotel’s buffet breakfast offers a wide range of dishes, and there are à-la-carte breakfast options. There is also a snack bar and room service.

The Ramblas are just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Gaudí’s iconic Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are also within a 10-minute walk. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya.

Set in a listed 19th-century building and 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, the St. Moritz offers stylish accommodation. It features modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and LCD satellite TV.

The Hotel HCC St. Moritz maintains its original central staircase and marble reception. Its rooms offer simple, classic décor with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and toiletries.

A varied buffet breakfast is served daily, and you can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes for dinner in the St Gallen Restaurant, where menus use fresh, seasonal produce.

Passeig de Gràcia and its Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are one stop away. Barcelona Port is just over 1 km from the St. Moritz.

Overlooking Barceloneta Beach and Barcelona city centre, this design hotel has 2 outdoor pools and luxury spa with city views. Hotel Arts offers art collection and a restaurant with 2 Michelin stars.

The Arts is situated next to Barcelona’s Olympic Port and surrounded by shops and lively bars. Barceloneta Beach is 250 metres away, while Ciutadella Park is 300 metres away.

The Arts Hotel’s rooms include a flat-screen TV and sound system. The bathrooms have a separate bath and a shower.

The hotel’s Enoteca restaurant, awarded 2 Michelin stars, serves fine Mediterranean cuisine. The property includes a number of other bars and restaurants, including a pool-side bar serving light meals in the summer.

Hotel Arts has a hair salon and various luxury fashion boutiques. The hotel also offers a multilingual concierge team and a fully equipped business centre.

Hotel_Name: Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel
Hotel_Description_Long:
The Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG Hotel is located in the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, ​​a short walk from the Plaça Catalunya metro station and in the Portal del Angel shopping district and 10 minutes from the Paseo de Gracia shopping area. This elegantly designed property features a Mediterranean restaurant, a cafeteria, a terrace with a bar and a rooftop pool.

All rooms feature contemporary décor. All have a yoga mat, tea and coffee making facilities, smart TV, minibar and exclusive bathrobe.In addition, the hotel offers the Forgot it? We got it! Which makes available to its guests a whole series of amenities and accessories that will further improve their stay.

The gastronomic space of the Kimpton Vividora Hotel, an IHG chain hotel, has a rooftop terrace with magnificent views of the city, pool, sun loungers, cocktails and snacks, Terraza de Vivi. The Fauna restaurant located on the first floor offers Mediterranean cuisine with Catalan roots in a room reminiscent of a typical Eixample apartment. Got Coffee & Cocktails overlooks the street and serves locally sourced coffee, wine and signature cocktails. This gastronomic space is a place where guests feel at home. Every day from 6pm the free Social Wine Hour is offered to all guests with an open bar of local wines.

This pet-friendly hotel is close to attractions such as Barcelona Cathedral, Plaza de Catalunya and the Palau de la Música Catalana. Barcelona-El Prat Airport, located 15 km away, is the closest.

Our clients say that this part of Barcelona is their favorite, according to independent comments.

Hotel Turin Barcelona is located just 50 meters from the famous Ramblas in Barcelona. It offers free Wi-Fi, 24-hour reception, free luggage storage and a lovely sun terrace. There is free water, coffee and tea in the lobby lounge.

It features stylish rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. They are equipped with a private bathroom, hairdryer, safe, Smart TV and minibar.

The Turin Hotel is located just 150 meters from the Gothic District, 3 minutes from the Liceu metro and a 20-minute walk from the beach. In the area there are several restaurants, shops and supermarkets open until late.

The hotel offers a fabulous breakfast buffet. Most of the food items come from La Boquería Market, located 2 minutes' walk away.

Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre.

It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel.

At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property.

Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi.

Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

This hotel is housed in a vintage, 19th-century building on central Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia. It lies at the heart of the city’s Modernist Route architecture trail.

The Hotel Paseo de Gracia is surrounded by chic boutiques and stunning architecture on one of the city’s main boulevards. On the same street, just a short walk away, you will find 2 of Gaudí’s most important Modernist works, La Pedrera and Casa Batlló. Several metro lines run nearby, giving you excellent access to any of Barcelona’s many sights.

The hotel’s simple, functional guestrooms all come with a TV. Some boast balconies overlooking Passeig de Gracia.

There are vending machines for drinks and snacks.

Located in a historic building in the heart of Rambla Catalunya, Mosaic Barcelona by Ona is situated in Barcelona, 10 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya and 5 minutes' walk from Casa Batllo and La Pedrera. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned, and features a flat-screen TV and modern décor. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a shower.

Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Barcelona. The hotel also offers car hire.

Due to its central location, several bars and restaurants can be found nearby.

The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Mosaic Barcelona by Ona.

Located on Gran Via, in central Barcelona, the stylish Hotel Soho features a rooftop seasonal pool and sun terrace with panoramic views. It is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia Boulevard.

The chic, air-conditioned rooms at the Soho are soundproof and offer flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. They also have an ambient lighting system and include modern bathrooms with hairdryers.

Guests can enjoy a rich breakfast on the spacious terrace, weather permitting. The front desk is available 24-hours a day and offers a ticket service.

The Soho is a 5-minute walk from the airport bus stop in Plaza Universitat, and Urgell Metro Station is just 130 metres away.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel features a rooftop terrace with a pool providing 360 degree panoramic views of Barcelona. The hotel is located just 300 metres from Urquinaona Metro Station.

All rooms are soundproof and air-conditioned, equipped with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. A safety deposit box is also available. Bathrooms has a shower and a hairdryer.

Yurbban Trafalgar Hotel also offers a gym, a bar and a restaurant. A tour desk and laundry facilities are available.

Shops, bars and restaurants can be found within metres from the hotel. Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk away and Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

Catalonia Castellnou offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and bright, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. It is located 250 metres from Tres Torres Underground Station, in a quiet residential area.

There are many cafés, bars and restaurants within a 10-minute walk, in the centre of Sarrià.

Hotel Catalonia Castellnou is close to some of Barcelona’s most important medical centres, including Clínica IVI, Clínica Corachan and Fertilab.

The Castellnou offers easy access to the C32 Ring Road and Vallvidrera Tunnel. It is within a 15-minute train journey of central Barcelona, and less than 2 km from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium.Diagonal Avenue, with El Corte Ingles Department Store and two shopping centres, is a 10-minute walk away. Real Club de Tenis Barcelona is 15-minute walk away.

AC Hotel Sants is located just 50 metres from Barcelona Sants Train Station. It offers 24-hour reception and modern, air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and free safe.

Each room features special reading lamps, 4 pillows and elegant furnishings. They come equipped with a desk and a minibar. Some rooms offer city views.

Free WiFi is available in the lobby and bar. The restaurant inside the property serves a breakfast buffet every morning.

AC Hotel Sants is around 500 metres from Plaça Espanya and Montjuic. Sants Station offers direct metro access to Plaça Catalunya and Las Ramblas, as well as direct access to El Prat Airport.
